name: 3 Hwr Doeth
description: A mysterious hip hop crew from the Caernarfon area, big on lo-fi beats, weird pseudonyms and swearing, 3 Hwr Doeth bring the weirdness and Welsh language rap grubbiness in the best way since cult icons Tystion. Their debut, self-titled album, released on the great Pasta Hull label, is a rowdy 16-tracker, taking in much guest appearances and dissolute living, and which, in Smocio, Hustlo, Dwyn O Tesco, contains both epic title and life motto, whatever lingo you speak.
description_cy: Hip hop collective o Gaernarfon yw 3 Hwr Doeth, yn arbrofi gyda synau gwahanol ag yn uno eu dylanwadau eclectig i greu rap Cymraeg sy’n ymgorffori elfennau o funk, jazz a blues.

name: Alffa
description: In these mid-apocalyptic craptimes, you have to hold on to good news when you can, so it’s been majorly heartening to see the unexpected success that’s landed at Alffa’s door recently. Made up of two lads from Llanrug, North Wales, fresh from school, last year Alffa famously became the first band to achieve one million streams of a Welsh language song on Spotify, and now on over 2.8 million for Gwenwyn, a blues rock stomper in Black Keys or White Stripes vein. But there’s more: the rock is strong with these ones; expect a global takeover.
description_cy: Alffa yw’r band Cymraeg cyntaf yn y byd i gyrraedd 1,000,000 o streams ar Spotify! Ma’r ddeuawd yn ddewiniaid ar greu riffs blues rock trwm a mae’r ddeuawd o Langrug yn barod i gymryd dros y byd, a’r gweddill.

name: Alien Tango
description: Bonkers brilliant Spanish electro-pop of the highest order. Supremely eclectic mix of high energy synths, psychedelic disco, glam stomp and latino flourishes. The “Isla Bonita” EP on cult Barcelona label Foehn Records will give you a brief glimpse into his out of this world mindset. This is sure to be one of the most FUN sets of the weekend!
description_cy: Tu ôl i Alien Tango a’i drôn electrolatin psych mae Alberto Garcia yn cuddio. Cerddor o Sbaen ydyw sy’n byw yn Llundain ond sydd a’i atennas wedi’u cyfeirio at y gofod, y man lle daw ei gerddoriaeth psychelic, glam, hip-hop a’i lais helium-aidd. Rhyddhaodd cyflwynaid o’i EP ar Foehn Records gan gadarnhau mai Alien Tango yw un o greaduriaid gorau’r sin gerddorol yn Llundain.

name: Amber Arcades
description: A well-travelled internationalist, Amber Arcades’ latest album European Heartbreak maybe titled a little painfully for some at this time, but still confirms Annelotte de Graaf as one of the best crafters of lopsided psychedelic dreampop around. Deceptively gentle, European Heartbreak still hides dark corners in its summery meanderings, and follows Wouldn’t Even Know, her Nancy and Lee-style duet with Bill Ryder-Jones, who is also playing this year’s Swn… Whatever happens, everything will be alright for this set at least.
description_cy: Rhyngwladolydd gyda digon o brofiad teithio tu ôl iddi, mae albwm diweddaraf Amber Arcades ‘European Heartbreak‘ yn dyst i dalent Annelotte de Graaf fel un o grefftwyr pop-breuddwydiol seicedelig gorau sydd o gwmpas. Yn dwyllodrus o dyner, mae European Heartbreak dal i guddio corneli tywyll yn ei hystumiadau hafol, ac yn dilyn y gân Wouldn’t Even Know, ei deuawd gyda Bill Ryder-Jones, sydd hefyd yn chwarae Sŵn eleni.

name: Ani Glass
description: One of the most anticipated events of 2019, in the more discerning parts at least, is the debut album from Ani Saunders. Since 2016, having left pop modernists The Pipettes, Glass has been releasing electronic tracks laced with quiet drama, with Perianaeth Perffaith, all ice vocals and synth swooning, one of last year’s best. Now, her recent MA in Urban and Regional Development has informed a forthcoming album of modern city songs: gleaming, frantic and celebratory.
description_cy: Un o artistiaid oddi ar y label arbrofol o gaerdydd, Recordiau Neb yw Ani Glass. Does dim diwedd i allbynnau creadigol Ani Glass, yn o gystal a sgwennu cerddoriaeth pop electronig, mae hi hefyd yn cynhyrchu ei cherddoriaeth i gyd ag yn arlunydd a ffotograffydd brwd. “Cerddoriaeth ar gyfer diwedd y byd, a dechrau un newydd” meddai Laura Snapes o Pitchfork.

name: Asha Jane
description: Asha Jane is and explorative artist that experiments with delivery, form and audience. A true performer that shape-shifts from one world to another, Asha Jane will sometimes be caught on stage with intricate wings, installed art pieces or mythological decor on stage.
description_cy: Artist chwilfrydig yw Asha Jane sy’n arbrofi gyda chynulleidfa, ffurf a pherfformiad. Yn berfformwraig sy’n neidio o un blaned i’r llall, gellir weld Asha Jane ar lwyfan gyda darnau celf, rhyw fath o decor mytholegol neu hyd yn oed yn gwisgo adennydd. Gyda’i llais anhygoel a dynamig, mae Asha Jane yn llwyddo creu sŵn sy’n llawn teimlad a sy’n sicr o’ch hudo.

name: audiobooks
description: Trippy story-telling through haunted, blasé vocals over a bed of moorish electronics. This is the sound of Audiobooks. Another unique gem offered by Heavenly Recordings. The duo’s debut album, ‘Now! (in a minute)’ is centred around strange short stories that Evangeline Ling would save in her text message drafts that genius producer David Wrench wanted to collaborate on. What’s delivered is an impressive collection of beautifully disfigured pop songs. Audiobooks create experimental pop at it’s most intense. Come get hypnotized.
description_cy: Llais achlysurol yn adrodd straeon trippy dros wely o synau electroneg caethiwus. Dyma swn unigryw audiobooks. Perl prydferth arall o deulu Heavenly Recordings. Fe rhyddhawyd y ddeuawd eu album cyntaf ‘Now! (In A Minute)’ llynedd. Mae’r album wedi’i seilio ar straeon byrion cantres y band, Evangeline Ling a gwaith electroneg y cynhyrchydd eiconig, David Wrench. Beth sy’n cael ei gyflwyno yw casgliad trawiadol o ganeuon pop wedi’i ddadadeiladu. Mae audiobooks yn creu y pop arbrofol mwya dwys yn y bydysawd – dewch i gael eich hudoli.

name: Bambara
description: A shot of pure dark stuff from this Brooklyn trio, who started in Athens, Georgia and brought all that Southern Gothic creepiness into their pitch black noise rock. Based around the twin brothers of Reid and Blaze Bateh (also the backing band for the most recent Liars tour), on three albums Bambara have created a pulverising mix of twisted garage rock, mutant rockabilly and perverse storytelling, like Health, the Birthday Party and Swans playing a dive bar in a David Lynch film. And they do a mean Kate Bush cover.
description_cy: Bydd y triawd o Frooklyn a ddechreuodd yn Athens, Georgia yn dod â roc tywyll, Gothic ysgytwol a thywyll i Gaerdydd. Mae’r ddau efaill Reid a Blaze Bateh (sydd hefyd yn rhan o fand cefndirol y daith Liars) wedi creu tri albym sy’n uno roc garej, rocabili rhyfedd a’r ddawn o ddweud stori i’r dim. Ma nhw hefyd yn neud cyfyr gwych o gân gan Kate Bush.

name: Bess Atwell
description: From her name to the bewitching purity of her vocal style, there’s something out-of-time about Bess Atwell, an otherworldliness that’s nearer to 50 or 100 years ago than the present. A young folk singer from the South Downs, Atwell came to prominence with 2016’s Hold Your Mind, a collection of songs that added minimal backing to clear melodies reminiscent of Joni Mitchell or Laura Marling. 2018’s new tracks Grace and Swimming Pool add a little full band shading to their lilting phrases, and set the bar high for a stellar 2019.
description_cy: Mae Bess Atwell yn arbenigwr ar greu harmonïau syfrdanol drwy ei cherddoriaeth gwerin cyfoes. Mae ei cherddoriaeth bregus a swynol yn haeddu’ch sylw.

name: Big Joanie
description: After supporting kindred spirits Bikini Kill for two sold out nights at the Brixton Academy as well as tours with the likes of Shopping and Parquet Courts their star seems very much in the ascendancy. Debut album “Sistahs” (released late last year on Thurston Moore et al’s new label) confirmed their status as undisputed Queens of the London DIY punk scene and far beyond.
description_cy: Band pync, ffeinyddol, groenddu yw Big Joanie. Ma’ nhw fel The Ronettes wedi’i hidyllu trwy sîn DIY yr 80au a Riot Grrrl y 90au, gyda chydig bach o dashikiswedi’i daflu ar eu pennau. Ffurfiodd Big Joanie yn Llundain yn Haf 2013 er mwyn perfformio yn First Times ac yn 2016, rhyddhaodd y band sengl wych o’r enw ‘Crooked Room’ ar eu label ei hun. Erbyn hyn yn un o selogion y sin pync DIY yn Llundain, maent wedi bod yn teithio o gwmpas Ewrop yn cefnogi bandiau fel Downtown Boys, Shopping, Parquet Courts a llawer mwy.

name: Big Thing
description: A band as new and shiny as the music they create, Cardiff’s Big Thing may be barely three online songs old, but are already making big impressive strides. On Freaking Out they channel pure singalong guitar pop, halfway between ‘80s jangle and summery ‘90s Britpop, while on Spin Big Thing prove equally adept at slowing and expanding their sound, dialing up the shoegaze guitars and epic melodies. Watch them fly.
description_cy: Pedwarawd o Gaerdydd yw Big Thing sy’n canu caneuon pop scuzzy am gariad, colled a nosweithiau lletchwith fyse’n teimlo’n gartrefol rhwng bandiau dreampop, shoegaze ag amgen y 90’au.

name: Bilge Pump
description: A sporadic but vital presence in both the Leeds and underground noise rock scenes, Bilge Pump recently released We Love You, their first album for ten years, and a slap in the chops reminder of their greatness. Though they never really went away: cropping up in toilet gigs and Marc Riley sessions, Bilge Pump sets are a fabulous mixture of scabrous avant-rock rhythms, sideways guitar noise and absurdist Northern humour, as addictive as your mate’s pub’s lock in. Even their Wikipedia page is top. The Mighty Bilge Pump, as someone would say.
description_cy: Yn bresenoldeb ysbeidiol ond hanfodol yn Leeds a sŵn y sîn roc tanddaearol, rhyddhaodd Bilge Pump We Love You, eu halbym cyntaf ers deng mlynedd, yn albym sy’n atgoffa pawb o’u mawredd. Er iddynt erioed ddiflannu yn gyfan gwbl, wrth ymddangos mewn gigs toiled a sesiynau Marc Riley, mae Bilge Pump yn gyfuniad gwefreiddiol o rythmau avant-rock, sŵn gitâr ysblennydd a hiwmor gogleddol hurt, maent yr un mor gaethiwus â lock in mewn tafarn dy ffrind. Mae eu tudalen Wikipedia hyd yn oed yn wych. The Mighty Bilge Pump, ys dywed rhai...

name: Bill Ryder-Jones
description: A founder member of Merseyside band The Coral when he was still in school, since 2008 Bill Ryder-Jones has quietly flourished as a solo artist of great variety and style. His debut album If… was all instrumental beauty and appearances from the Liverpool Philharmonic Orchestra, while A Bad Wind Blows In My Heart, his second, embraced a slowburn style, touching on Smog or Red House Painters. More albums followed, heavier, folkier, while Ryder-Jones also completed small-scale film scores and production work. An adept cataloguer of life behind curtained windows, it’s a body of work that can only expand in fascinating ways.
description_cy: Un o sylfaenwyr Merseyside band The Coral pan oedd yn yr ysgol, ers 2008 mae Bill Ryder-Jones wedi blodeuo’n dawel fel artist unigol gydag amrywiaeth a steil. Roedd ei albwm cyntaf If… yn gampwaith offerynnol gyda pherfformiadau gan Gerddorfa Ffilharmonig Lerpwl, tra bod A Bad Wind Blows In My Heart, ei ail albym yn cofleidio ei steil araf-losgi, yn cyffwrdd ar Smog neu Painters Red House. Yna daeth mwy o albymau trymach a gwerinol, wrth i Ryder-Jones gwblhau cyfansoddi cerddoriaeth ar gyfer ffilmiau a gwaith cynhyrchu. Cawn yma gorff o waith sydd am ehangu a datblygu mewn ffyrdd diddorol a hudol.

name: Black Country, New Road
description: A sprawling 6-piece transplanted from Cambridge to London, BCNR make an excellently uncategorizable brew of strung out post rock and spoken word, psychodramas topped with violin, sax and general anguish. Debut single Athen’s, France, another of Speedy Wunderground’s stream of limited 7” releases, has it all: a creepy, sardonic tale unfolding over shifting tempos, pushing and pulling into crunches reminiscent of Slint or Godspeed, for six unsettling minutes. London’s best and most enigmatic new band for a reason.
description_cy: 6awd a thrawsblannodd o Cambridge i Lundain, mae BCNR yn creu miwsig ddi-categori anhygoel mewn llinyn o lafarganu ôl-roc, fiolinau dramatig, sacsoffon a gofid cyffredinol. Mae gan y sengl début Athen’s, France, popeth chi angen: chwedl iasol sy’n datblygu dros dempo symudol, yn gwthio a thynnu a chrensio yn debyg i Slint neu Godspeed, am 6 munud ansefydlog. Band newydd gorau a fwyaf enigmatig am reswm.

name: Bloxx
description: Bloxx’s pop-heavy indie hooks are impossible to dislodge and ridiculously moreish. A still-young fourpiece from Uxbridge, West London, early singles Your Boyfriend and You garnered the attention of Annie Mac and Huw Stephens, and landed plum support slots with the Wombats and Sundara Karma. Revolving around singer Orphelia’s ability to quickly flip from laidback to impassioned, recent songs like Headspace also show a nice ‘80s direction, leading to shrewd bets for Bloxx to ‘do a Paramore’ in 2019.
description_cy: Rhybudd sŵn: bydd yn barod i bacio dy blygs clustiau wrth fynd i weld band newydd gorau Caerdydd. Yn cynnwys aelodau o Exit_International a Salt Bath gyda llais anhygoel Amber Efstathiou, er mai dim ond un tap demo mlwydd oed yw’r ffrwydriad ysgytwol yma o fand mae eu perfformiadau byw yn tanlinellu’r hyn rydym yn delio ag ef: sŵn ffyrnig a gwyllt sy’n pryfocio, cylchu ac yna’n chwalu dy wyneb. Paid a meiddio bod yng nghefn yr ystafell ar gyfer y perfformiad yma.

name: Bodyhacker
description: Noise alert: earplugs and neck stretches ready for the best new band in Cardiff right now. A piledriving blast featuring members of Exit_International and Salt Bath, with the blistering vocals of Amber Efstathiou up front, Bodyhacker may only be one demo tape old in online terms, but live shows underline what we’re dealing with here: fierce and feral noise rock that teases, circles then smashes you in the face. Don’t be at the back for this.
description_cy: Rhybudd sŵn: bydd yn barod i bacio dy blygs clustiau wrth fynd i weld band newydd gorau Caerdydd. Yn cynnwys aelodau o Exit_International a Salt Bath gyda llais anhygoel Amber Efstathiou, er mai dim ond un tap demo mlwydd oed yw’r ffrwydriad ysgytwol yma o fand mae eu perfformiadau byw yn tanlinellu’r hyn rydym yn delio ag ef: sŵn ffyrnig a gwyllt sy’n pryfocio, cylchu ac yna’n chwalu dy wyneb. Paid a meiddio bod yng nghefn yr ystafell ar gyfer y perfformiad yma.

name: Brand New Friend
description: Super-infectious buzzsaw pop from Castlerock, Northern Ireland, Brand New Friend formed around brother/sister duo Lauren and Taylor Johnson, and quickly started winning hearts through their irrepressible, impossible-to-dislodge tunefulness. A tsunami of hooks that mixes the direct garage punk of Buzzcocks or Undertones with the college rock melodicism of someone like The Thermals, BNF songs are tight, thrashy and, when those sibling vocals merge, achieve lift off more often than not.
description_cy: Mae’r ddeuawd brawd a chwaer o Ogledd Iwerddon; Lauren a Taylor Johnson wedi ennill sawl calon gyda’u tiwns buzzsaw pop anadferadwy a heintus. Mae Brand New Friend yn taflu tonnau enfawr o hooks sy’n cymysgu garage punk Buzzcocks a Undertones gyda roc-coleg melodig The Thermals.

name: Bryde
description: Since leaving folk duo Paper Aeroplanes, then collaborating as vocalist on a number of trance singles, Sarah Howells is stepping out as sole owner of Bryde, shorn of other members but with her loudest, most powerful material yet. If you haven’t seen the video for To Be Brave yet, please rectify immediately: as Howells steps over wintry, windblown landscapes, guitars chime and build towards a quietly devastating, string-aided climax. The debut Bryde LP Like An Island has more – this is emotional heft and quiet confidence far removed from any dull ‘singer-songwriter’ tag you dare apply.
description_cy: Ers gadael y ddeuawd werin Paper Aeroplanes, ac yna’n cydweithio fel canwr ar nifer o draciau trance, mae Sarah Howells yn camu mas fel arweinydd solo Bryde, ond gyda’i deunydd mwyaf pwerus a chryf eto. Os nad ydych chi wedi gweld y fideo am To Be Brave eto, ewch i’w weld ar unwaith!

name: Campfire Social
description: Epic, emotional, melancholic but uplifting indie rock. This Llangollen collective will have fans of Frightened Rabbit, Broken Social Scene etc. dancing and crying into their pints at the same time. After playing festivals as far afield as South Korea and Canada we welcome them back to Cardiff with open arms and a fuzzy warm glow that seems to be eagerly reciprocated in every note.
description_cy: Mae Campfire Social yn creu sŵn cyfoethog gyda harmoniau llachar, hyfryd a melodïau synfyfyriol. Mae eu hagwedd onest yn adlewyrchu cariad a diwylliant emo y 90au. Caneuon sy’n sobri’r meddwl ond yn mynnu rhoi un neges bwysig, ry’n ni’n well gyda’n gilydd. Cafodd eu EP diweddaraf ‘Wellbeing’ ei roi ar Rhestr A BBC Radio Wales gan sicrhau cefnogaeth barhaol gan BBC 6 Music a sesiwn byw gyda Janice Long.

name: Casi
description: One foot in Celtic mysticism and Welsh folksong, one in the world of crisp electronic beats, Casi Wyn, on the evidence of recent EP ‘Sunflower Seeds’, has created a dazzling and fascinating space between ancient and modern. Inspired by Casi’s return from London to her Welsh homeland, it’s music that swells with strings and sweeping vocals, magical, almost alien stuff that transports the mountaintops to the dancefloor.
description_cy: Yn dilyn rhyddhau eu EP diweddaraf ‘Sunflower Seeds’ mae Casi Wyn wedi creu gofod diddorol a hollol unigryw rhwng yr hen a’r newydd yn pontio chwedlau Celtaidd, caneuon traddodiadol Cymreig â churiadau electronig miniog.  Wedi’i hysbrydoli ar ôl dychwelyd yn ôl o Lundain i’w mamwlad – Cymru, mae’r gerddoriaeth yn gorlifo mewn llinynnau swynol a lleisiau hyfryd, hudolus ac estronaidd sy’n dod a mynyddoedd Eryri i’r llawr ddawnsio.

name: Charlotte Adigery
description: Intensively playful, supremely expensive pop music from this Belgian-Caribbean artist. Charlotte Adigery creates music that’s slinky and moreish (‘High Lights’, about her love of wigs), a delicious rush of Creole smoothness (‘Patenipat’), or the occasional overload of ASMR-triggering sound effects (‘Cursed And Cussed’, will make your head explode). Sometimes produced and released by the Dewaele brothers from Soulwax and 2ManyDJs, Adigery is a total package of brains and thrills, hooks and class.
description_cy: Mae EP newydd y cerddor Belg-Carabiaidd – Charlotte Adigery ‘Zandoli’ yn profi bod gan y ferch dalentog yma ffordd arbennig o ddweud stori. Weithiau’n hollol wirion, weithiau’n hollol ddifrifol, mae meddwl Adigery yn crwydro a chwyrlio o gwmpas straeon a chwedlau abswrd, teimladwy a llawn hwyl. Wedi’i dysgu gan ei mam (a gafodd ei geni yn Martinique) mae perthynas y rhythm a’r gerddoriaeth a phwysigrwydd hiwmor – yn sicrhau fod Adigery yn gerddor argyhoeddiadol ifanc sy’n gallu canu am fadfalloedd mewn un cân a latex yn yr un nesaf.

name: Chastity Belt
description: Probably the coolest bunch of mates to pick up guitars and form a band, since 2013’s ‘No Regrets’, Seattle-based Chastity Belt have been issuing a high grade stream of whip-smart indie rock, three albums of brash and chilled and intelligent music. A product of the great Pacific North West DIY scene (singer Julia Shapiro is also in the excellent Childbirth with Tacocat’s Bree McKenna), CB songs cover ground from sex positivity to hometown pride with inclusive toughness and stoned wit. It’s good to have them back.
description_cy: Ychydig o flynyddoedd yn ôl, tra ar daith rhywle yn Idaho, aeth aelodau’r band Chastity Belt ati ladd amser mewn ffordd anarferol – penderfynnnon nhw i ganmol ei gilydd gan feddwl yn ddwys ac mewn manylder am yr hyn oedden nhw’n dweud. Gan eu bod mor onest a mor agos fel band, mae’r egni a’r perthynas arbennig yma yn disgleirio trwy eu caneuon. Rhyddhawyd eu trydydd albym ‘I Used to Spend So Much Time Alone’ yn Ngorffennaf 2016, albym ôl-bync, tywyll a hardd sy’n llawn hiwmor rhyfedd – ewch i wrando arno nawr!

name: CHROMA
description: A celebratory fixture amongst the bigger gigs and awards ceremonies of South Wales, Pontypridd’s Chroma get a little bigger, a little stompier every year. Led by the fierce and charismatic Katie Hall, Chroma music is the type of glam garage rock that struts and bounces, a totally inclusive pop party best displayed in the recent single Girls Talk: three minutes of Yeah Yeah Yeahs-level brashness and cool. They may be unstoppable.
description_cy: Yn dilyn perfformio mewn gigs a seremonïau dros Dde Cymru, mae Chroma o Bontypridd, yn cryfhau ac yn aeddfedu ychydig mwy bob blwyddyn. Wedi’u harwain gan y ferch ffyrnig a charismatig, Katie Hall, mae cerddoriaeth Chroma yn glam roc garej sy’n bownsio a ffrwydro, parti pop cwbl gynhwysol sy’n cael ei ddathlu a’i arddangos orau yn ei sengl Girls Talk: tri munud o cŵl. Gall neb stopio Chroma.

name: Claque (THE)
description: Since leaving scabrous noise merchants Girl Band in 2017, guitarist Alan Duggan hooked up with fellow Dublin pals Kate Brady and Paddy Ormond to form The Claque. The crunchy, industrial guitar tone remains, but The Claque are very much their own thing: debut single ‘Hush/Stray’ is a great rattle of drum machines and shifting noise, Brady’s clipped and strident vocals meshed with alien soundscapes. Brand new, do not miss.
description_cy: The Claque yw Alan Duggan, Kate Brady a Paddy Ormond. Hen ffrindiau o Ddulyn sy’n wynebau cyfarwydd i sîn y ddinas. Dechreuodd y prosiect yn 2017 gyda’r bwriad o blethu sawl elfen a chwaeth gerddorol i greu cerddoriaeth sy’n haentus a heriol.

name: Clwb Fuzz
description: Post-punk garage rock band, formed at University of South Wales in Cardiff. Influences include My Bloody Valentine, The Pixies, Smashing Pumpkins and Sonic Youth.
description_cy: Band ôl-bync, roc garej a ffurfiwyd ym Mhrifysgol De Cymru yng Nghaerdydd. Gyda dylanwadau gan My Bloody Valentine, The Pixies, Smashing Pumpkins a Sonic Youth.

name: Comet is Coming (THE)
description: An epic, interplanetary meeting between cosmic saxman Shabaka Hutchings of modernist jazz icons Sons Of Kemet, and Dan and Max of pounding synths and drums outfit Soccer96, The Comet Is Coming have been bringing the galactic dance party since 2013. A wild brew of distorted funk, jazz and feral electronica, latest album Trust in the Lifeforce of the Deep Mystery is another spectrum of far out sounds, and shows again why they’re such a vital, brutal, hands-up-in-another-dimension live draw.
description_cy: Cyfarfod epig, rhyngblanedol rhwng chwaraeydd sacsoffon Shabaka Hutchingo’r eicon jazz modern ‘Sons of Kemet‘ a Dan a Max o Soccer96 sydd ar y synth a’r dryms. Mae The Comet Is Coming wedi bod yn dod a’r parti dawnsio rhyngblanedol i’n clustiau ers 2013. Yn gawl gwallgof o distorted funk, jazz a electronica gwyllt, mae’r albym ddiweddaraf ‘Trust in the Life Force of the Deep Mystery‘ ar y sbectrwm o synau sydd tu hwnt i’r byd yma, sy’n dangos pam eu bod yn fand byw anghredadwy, creulon a chwyldroadol.

name: Conchúr White
description: Previously the frontman for Portadown indie folk band Silences, and the face of a campaign promoting UK music on a fleet of Chinese buses (!), Conchúr White’s nascent solo work has a stripped back, haunting quality, White’s delicate vocals picking out the melody, drifting into occasional falsetto. It’s sparse and beautiful stuff, and recent trips to New York to work with Kevin McMahon (Frightened Rabbit, Real Estate) hint at a return to full band lushness, and promise quietly devastating music to come.
description_cy: Mae gwaith solo Conchúr White yn eginol a noeth, gyda ansawdd iasol a chain gyda’i lais yn pigo’r melodi ag yn llifo’n mewn i falsetto bob hyn a hyn. Cerddoriaeth prydferth a tenau sy’n cael ei gynnig a mae’n hawdd deall pam bod gymaint yn cael eu syfrdanu ganddo. Mae White wedi bod yn teithio i Efrog Newydd yn ddiweddar i weithio gyda Kevin McMahon (Frightened Rabbit, Real Estate) sy’n awgrymu bod e’n barod i ddychwelyd gyda band llawn a mwy o gerddoriaeth.

name: County Line Runner
description: Songwriter Adam Day (formerly of Lyrebirds) combines the driving epic stadium Americana rock sensibilities of a Springsteen, a Petty or a Fallon with a very British sense of  introversion, nostalgia and honesty. Simultaneously yearning for a more innocent past and hoping for a brighter future. Timeless songwriting that somehow feels very very Now.
description_cy: Mae alter ego y cerddor Adam Day, County Line Runner yn llwyddo i adlewyrchu cyfnod mewn amser ym mhob cân gan rhoi darn o’i hun mewn i bob cyfansoddiad. Erbyn hyn mae ei ganeuon cyntaf ‘Hard to Find’ a ‘Wide Eyes’ wedi’u ffrydio dros miliwn o weithiau ar Spotify ac wedi sicrhau cefnogaeth gan Clash Magazine, BBC Music a llawer mwy.

name: Creatures
description: With summery harmonies, spaghetti western riffs, groovy surf rock and retro backing vocals of oohs and lahs – Creatures are geared up to soundtrack your next road trip in a VW camper.  Formed in 2016, this vintage pop rock outfit drench their velvety 60s sound with warm sepia tones, like a waltz between The Doors and The Beatles. This is a band that’s perfected their sound well in advance, so they can enjoy the journey – hop in for the next stop.
description_cy: Gyda harmoniïau hafaidd, riffs o’r spaghetti westerns, surf rock groovy a digonedd o oohs a lahs – mae gan Creatures y cynhwysion i greu trac sain i’ch road trip nesaf yn y VW campervan yna. Dyma fand sydd wedi perffeithio’u swn yn gynnar yn y gêm er mwyn medru mwynhau’r daith – hopiwch ymlaen ar gyfer y stop nesaf.

name: Cruelty
description: Not even a year old and already handpicked by Idles to play their homecoming aftershow party, Bristol’s Cruelty are at the darker end of the guitar spectrum, playing bruisingly intense goth-laced rock. Debut single Disgraced flies past in two hectic minutes, a taut one-chord howl that finally bursts open, then stops dead. There will be more.
description_cy: Nid ydynt hyd yn oed yn flwydd oed ac mae Idles eisoes wedi eu dewis i chwarae yn eu parti ôl-sioe adref yn Mryste, mae Cruelty ar ben tywyllaf y sbectrwm gitâr, yn chwarae roc goth, dwys a chreulon. Mae ei sengl cyntaf ‘Disgraced’ yn pasio mewn dwy funud cythryblus, yn un cord mawr sy’n ffrwydro ar agor, yna’n syrthio’n farw. Mae mwy i ddod gan Cruelty.

name: Darren Eedens & The Slim Pickin’s
description: PSA: it’s compulsory to sip rye whiskey during this set. That or moonshine: Eedens is the folk and bluegrass troubadour par excellence, a banjo, fine moustache and an armoury of party songs and murder ballads. Originally from Ontario and now ensconced in Cardiff, Eedens has his Slim Pickins around him, tea chest bass and fiddle solo ready, and furious plucking and hoedown fun will be everyone’s.
description_cy: Yn wreiddiol o Gandada mae Darren Eedens wedi dod a’i ddylanwadau Americana a chanu gwlad i’w gartref newydd yma yng Nghaerdydd. Ar ôl casglu cerddorion lleol at ei gilydd, tyfodd y dylwanwadau a chwalwyd rheolau a ffiniau. Gyda David Grubb ar y ffidl, Rhys Morgan ar y bass a Edd Clemas ar y dryms mae’r band yn ffrwydraid egniol o banjo’s a gitar mewn arddull bluegrass.

name: Dehd
description: A product of Chicago’s tight-knit and incestuous DIY scene, the three members of Dehd came together in 2015, and quickly turned heads with their sparse and raw take on trebly guitar rock. Held down by Eric McGrady’s minimal drumkit thump, bassist Emily Kempf and guitarist Jason Balla pinball off each other, the latter howling and drawling over spooky Americana that recalls fellow cultists like The Cramps or Shannon And The Clams. Get converted.
description_cy: Cariad yw hud sy’n cael ei brofi bob dydd. Dyma’r neges y cawn ar ôl gwrando ar Water, albym newydd y triad o Chicago, Dehd. Mae’r cariad hwnnw yn codi i’r awyr fel stêm oddi ar balmant ar ddiwrnod braf. Mae’r cariad hwnnw hefyd yn torri eich calonnau, ond fe ddylsech chi deimlo’n lwcus i brofi fath deimlad. Dyma’r fath o beth darganfyddodd Jason Balla, Emily Kempf a Eric McGrady – Dehd nôl yn 2014 pan ffurfiodd y band. Mae Balla a Kempf yn rhan anatod o’r sîn DIY ffrwythlon yn Chicago. Pan ymunodd y ddau a’i gilydd gan dynnu ei ffrind Eric McGrady i’r arbrawf, darganfyddodd y tri bod ganddynt berthynas rhyfedd ac anesboniadwy….

name: Denuo
description: A mysterious North Walian presence seemingly dormant for years at a time, Denuo revolves around multi-instrumentalist Tom Mason, and his knack for tender, evocative cocoons of guitar and vocals. Since emerging with the more explicitly folky surround sounds of the ‘Wolf River’ EP, a more widescreen Denuo sound has developed, plangent, almost post-rock tones that envelop the listener, halfway between Jeff Buckley and M83.
description_cy: Presenoldeb llawn ddirgel o Ogledd Cymru, yn segur am fisoedd ar y tro yn ôl pob golwg, mae Denuo yn amgylchynu o gwmpas aml-offerynwr Tom Mason, a’i ddawn am leisiau a gitarau tyner ac atgofus. Ers dod i’r amlwg gyda’r synau mwy gwerinol yr EP ‘Wolf River’, mae Denuo wedi datblygu i ffurf fwy llydan, bron gyda thôn ôl-roc sy’n amgylchynu’r gwrandäwr, hanner ffordd rhwng Jeff Buckley a M83.

name: Devon
description: Not quite as un-Googleable as Yes, and surely not to be lurking in the internet’s shadows for much longer, Devon Cassells’ home-produced electropop is rapidly turning heads and gathering fans and playlists spots aplenty. As likely to feature crashing guitars as squealing beats, tracks like ‘Weirdo’ or ‘I Don’t Want 2 B UR Friend’ are a riot of irrepressible youthfulness, a blur of colour, attitude and fun that you could also invite home to meet your parents.
description_cy: Mae bron yn amhosib i chwilio am Devon ar Google (dal yn haws na Yes), ond mae’r cwest yn werth bob eiliad. Mae Devon Cassells yn coginio’i electropop deniadol yn ei stafell wely ag mae’n troi digonnedd o bennau gyda lle ar lawer playlists. Gyda cymysgedd smart o gitars mathredig a curiadau gwichfawr, mae caenuon fel ‘Weirdo’ a ‘I Don’t Want 2 B UR Friend’ yn reiat o anadferadwyedd ieuenctid, mwg o liw ag agwedd.

name: Do Nothing
description: Already big cheeses in their native Nottingham, Do Nothing songs play with the violence hidden under polite society, sometimes keeping it down, sometimes letting it out. Still only two singles old, both Witness and Handshakes are deceptively mannered takes on brooding rock and roll, half sung, half spoken vocals rolling over guitars always threatening to blaze into noise. Dark, literate, alluring… but you can hide at the back if you want.
description_cy: Yn barod yn enwau mawr yn eu cynefin – Nottingham, mae caneuon Do Nothing yn chwarae gyda’r trais cudd o dan gymdeithas cwrtais, weithiau yn cadw hi’n dawel, weithiau ar dop eu lleisiau. Gyda dim ond dau sengl i’w henw, mae’r ddau yn adlewyrchu sain roc a rôl, ag alawon wedi’i hanner-gannu, hanner-llafaru ar ben gitarau sy’n bygythio sain anferth, tywyll a hudolus.

name: Dry Cleaning
description: Live footage shows vocalist Florence standing behind a music stand and a sheaf of papers, as if preparing to give a post punk lecture. Spoken word meanderings dominate the London band’s music, oblique tales and non-sequiturs delivered over rock backing that’s taut, moody and fractious. With a delivery style that recalls Kim Gordon, Prolapse’s Linda Steelyard or Life Without Buildings’ Sue Tompkins, it’s a weird magic trick you’ll want to see multiple times.
description_cy: O weld ffilmiau o’r band yn perfformio’n fyw, mae’r prif leisydd Florence, yn sefyll tu ôl i stondin gerddoriaeth a thaflenni o bapurau arni, fel pe bai’n barod i roi darlith ar gerddoriaeth ôl-bync. Mae llafar ganu Florence yn dominyddu cerddoriaeth y band o Lundain, gyda hanesion a chwedlau yn cael eu hadrodd dros gerddoriaeth roc trwm. Gydag arddull sy’n debyg i Kim Gordon, Linda Steelyard o Porlapse neu Sue Tompkins o Life Without Buildings, mae’n dric hud, sydd angen cael ei weld dro ar ôl tro ar ôl tro.

name: Dylan Cartlidge
description: Seeing Dylan Cartlidge live will answer any questions you have about the well-earned hype that’s been engulfing his presence recently. His April release, an incredibly engaging EP titled ‘Monsters Under The Bed’ sees Cartlidge swim through psychey blues rock, powerful soul and funky hip hop that flows superbly. All the while, making it look so, so easy.
description_cy: Neuth gweld Dylan Cartlidge yn fyw ateb unrhyw gwestiynnau sydd gennych chi am y cyffro sy’n ymdrochi ei bresenoldeb at hyn o bryf. Fe rhyddhaodd EP hynod o afaelgar, ‘Monsters Under The Bed’ yn Ebrill a mae’n gweld Cartlidge yn nofio drwy rock blues psychedelic, soul pwerus a trwm a hip hop ffynci sy’n llifo’n rhagorol. Ag mae’n neud i hyn edrych mor mor hawdd.

name: Eädyth
description: A bilingual, multi-instrumental, self-producing artist from Merthyr, Eädyth Crawford makes soulful, modern R&B that’s luscious and powerful in equal measures. Recent tracks ‘Shots’ and ‘Break’ show Eädyth’s range: the former a layered, down-tempo groove; the latter a propulsive banger that slaps with moodiness. Both showcase Eädyth’s stacked vocal skills, and hint at more to come from this youthful talent.
description_cy: Aml-offerynnwr sy’n hunan-gynhyrchu yw Eädyth o Merthyr. Mae Eädyth Crawford yn creu R&B modern llawn enaid a haenau. Mae’r ddau sengl diweddara, Shots a Break yn lordio ystod eang o sgiliau Eädyth, ei llais a’i chynhyrchu gwybodus sy’n gaddo lot mwy i ddod gan y talent ifanc yma.

name: Easy Life
description: From Leicester pubs to Coachella deserts, Easy Life’s widescreen R&B has taken them on a rapid flight into orbit. They’ve kept it real though: the rough edges on lead vocalist Murray’s words remain, the tales of life lacking money and love still form the backbone of Easy Life’s music. Listen to their singles: Pockets and Temporary Love Part 1 & 2 both splurge on skittering falsettos, clean keys and brass pokes, mixing innovative electronic sounds with proper band, full earworm tunes. Dangerously addictive boys.
description_cy: O dafarndai Caerlŷr i anialwch Coachella, mae R&B Easy Life wedi’u harwain ar eu taith gyflym syth mewn i orbit. Er hyn, mae eu traed yn gadarn ar y ddaear: mae llais pigog a garw’r prif leisydd, Murray yn parhau, gyda’i hanesion am brinder arian a chariad yn asgwrn cefn i gerddoriaeth Easy Life. Gwrandewch ar eu senglau: Pockets and Temporary Love Part 1 & 2, mae’r ddwy sengl yn llawn skit falsetto, allweddellau glan a prociadau cryf gan offerynnau pres. Yn cyfuno synau electronig arloesol gyda band go iawn a  tiwns gogoneddus. Mae peryg o fod yn gaeth i’r band hwn.

name: Egyptian Blue
description: From humble beginnings above a jewellery shop in Colchester these young (post) punks have coalesced in Brighton where they have sharpened their riffs and simultaneously darkened their lyrical world view. With the aid of producer pal Theo Verney they reflect this murky modern world we live in with an unexpected sense of euphoria and urgency.
description_cy: Yn creu cerddoriaeth psychedelic, ôl-bync, mae Egyptian Blue yn don enfawr o gitar miniog a melodïau taranllyd. Ar ôl ffurfio mewn siop gemwaith yn Colchester, mae’r pedwarawd bellach yn byw yn Brighton. Mae enw’r band yn deillio o liw a ddiflanodd am gyfnod – glas tywyll iawn, daeth o gyfnod yr Aifft a ddiflannodd tan iddo gael ei ddarganfod unwaith eto yn ystod y cyfnod Romanaidd – ond peidiwch a phoeni, ni fydd Egyptian Blue yn diflannu!

name: Elis Derby
description: Comprehensive wide-boy vibes from this North Walian youngster, whose online presence is full of cheeky guitar numbers. There’s great playfulness to songs like ‘Yn Y Bôn’ or ‘Sut Allai Gadw Ffwrdd’, all Arctic Monkeys jinks or Supergrass vocal hooks, while ‘Prysur Yn Gwneud Dim Byd’ displays a chilled, Mac Demarco take on the world.
description_cy: Dechreuodd Elis recordio ac uwchlwytho demos i’w broffil Soundcloud yn ystod misoedd cynnar 2018, gan fynd ymlaen i ddechrau perfformio’n fyw ym mis Awst gyda band llawn. Ers hynny mae wedi bod yn gigio’n rheolaidd o gwmpas Cymru, a wedi ffeindio’r amser i ryddhau 3 sengl, gan gynnwys ei ddiweddaraf ‘Yn Y Bôn’, sydd allan nawr ar Recordiau Hufen. Gyda Haf 2019 yn rhagdybio i fod yn un prysur iawn iddo, y bwriad yw mynd i’r stiwdio i ddechrau rhoi sylfaen i albwm/EP sydd ganddo wedi ei ‘sgwennu yn barod – gyda mwy o fanylion i ddod ar hynny yn fuan!

name: Elsa Hewitt
description: A mesmerising concoction of electronic lo-fi house, future garage and experimental techno, Elsa Hewitt creates a distinctive yet unpredictable sound which evolves with every release. Her 5th album Citrus Paradisi was released in March of this year and has been on constant spin at Swn HQ.
description_cy: Cymsgedd syfrdanol o gerddoriaeth house lo-fi electroneg a techno arbrofol, mae Elsa Hewitt yn creu sain anrhagweladwy sy’n esblygu bob tro mae hi’n rhyddhau. Fe rhyddhaodd yr artist ei 5ed album; Citrus Paradisi yn mis Mawrth eleni a ni wedi bod yn chwarae’r casgliad newydd ar stereo y swyddfa ym mhencadlys Sŵn.

name: Emma McGrath
description: North Londoner Emma McGrath has been releasing music since she was 14, when her EP ‘The Judgement’ caught attention via its combination of pure folk directness and McGrath’s rough, powerful vocals. Subsequent releases have found McGrath working with Grammy winner Jimmy Hogarth (Amy Winehouse, Sia) and broadening her sonic palette to embrace a sweepingly emotive spectrum of sound. Currently in the midst of a triptych of EPs, recent track ‘Other Side’ brings mature pop touches to a simple love song, while still highlighting those strong, Tracey Chapman-esque vocals. All-conquering.
description_cy: Cerddoriaeth gwerin, pur ag uniongyrchol sydd yn cael ei gynnig gan Emma McGrath, sy’n bachu gyda llais anferth ag amrwd. Ar ol dilyniant cryf o rhyddhau senglau a mini-album yn 2018, mae McGrath wedi ffeinio’i hun yn gweithio gyda Jimmy Hogarth (Amy Winehouse, Sia) ag yn gweithio gyda paled sonig ehangach. Mae’r sengl diweddar, ‘Other Side’ yn dod a darnau pop aeddfed a can serch syml at eu gilydd, tra’n cadw’r llais cryf a rhyfeddol yna yn flaengar.

name: False Hope For The Savage
description: Something of a local supergroup, False Hope For The Savage are based in Cardiff, feature members of Samoans, Cut Ribbons and The Echo And The Always, and have been playing irregularly since forming a couple of years ago. As seen on two self-released EPs so far, moodily naming their songs sequentially with Roman numerals, their music is a gorgeously atmospheric take on post rock, songs languorously layered with effects pedal sheen, building to epic plateaus and crashes. There may be dry ice.
description_cy: Fel rhyw fath o supergroup lleol, mae False Hope For The Savage sydd wedi’i seilio yng Nghaerdydd, yn cynnwys aelodau o Samoans, Cut Ribbons a The Echo And The Always, ac wedi bod yn chwarae yn afreolaidd ers ffurfio cwpl o flynyddoedd yn ôl. Maent yn creu sain post-rock, atmosfferig sy’n adeiladu mewn ffordd epig i’r clustiau. Disgwyliwch fwg dramatig ar lwyfan yn ystod y perfformiad prin gan y bwystfilod swnllyd yma.

name: Far Caspian
description: Dreamy Leeds based (with roots in Liverpool and Ireland) indie-poppers with a wistful and hazy but highly melodic edge. Despite lyrical themes of depression, dislocation and deep mid Winter blues their musical outlook is far brighter and breezier than you might imagine, all shimmering guitar lines punctuated by emphatic gang vocals.
description_cy: Adeiladwyd cynsail lo-fi Far Caspian yn neuadd prifysgol y cynhyrchydd a’r prif leisydd, Joel Johnston cyn ymunodd Jof Cabeda (drymiau a llais) ac Alessia Scozarro (bass a llais). Ers denu sylw blogs yn fuan yn ystod eu gyrfa, mae’r band pop-breuddwydiol wedi eu henwi fel “One of the North’s best emerging indie bands of the year” gan The Line of Best Fit, gyda’r cynulleidfaoedd byw yn ymateb yn bositif tu hwnt i’w taith cyntaf wrth i nifer o’u perfformiadau werthu pob un tocyn.  Gyda’u tracs o’u EP cyntaf ‘Between Days’ a’u senglau breuddwydiol pop ‘A Dream of You’ a ‘Conversations’ yn derbyn cefnogaeth gan Radio 1, 6 Music a Radio X a chael eu caneuon wedi’u ffrydio miliynnau o weithiau ar Spotify a Youtube, mae Far Caspian yn parhau i greu stwr gyda’u tiwns aeddfed, llyfn ac unigryw.

name: Fatherson
description: Forming in Kilmarnock some years ago now, Fatherson fit beautifully into that lineage of Scottish bands, like Twilight Sad or Frightened Rabbit, whose Caledonian brogue and slow-burning music packs devastating emotional punches. Currently on album number three, Fatherson are still creating powerful indie rock music, music that swells and crashes with an intensity that speaks of more than just a three-piece band. Friends since childhood, they seem unstoppable, so let them in.
description_cy: Dringodd y band yma i’r ucheldiroedd yn seiliedig ar bobl yn siarad â’i gilydd, dim schort-cuts, jest pobl yn dwlu ac yn rhannu eu cerddoriaeth. Petai chi’n mynychu unrhyw gig Fatherson, byddwch chi’n siŵr o fod mewn ‘stafell llawn dop o ffans yn canu pob un gair o’u caneuon roc llawn angerdd. Yn wreiddiol o Kilmarnock, yr Alban,  mae’r tri ffrind ysgol wedi bod yn perfformio mewn lleoliadau sy’n dal 600 o bobl, ac yn gwerthu pob un tocyn – yn hawdd – ac hynny cyn iddynt ryddhau eu dwy albym cyntaf ‘I Am An Island’ (2014) ac ‘Open Book’ (2016).

name: Feet
description: A many-headed beast from Coventry, Feet are part of the fine tradition of slightly eccentric British psychedelia gangs. You might hear bits of the Beatles, the Coral or Syd Barrett here, but Feet are no retro merchants, rather a warped ideas factory, swerving between sounds and genres, all with a goofy smile on their faces. Having recently come under the wing of Yala! Records, Felix White from the Maccabees label and club night, festivals seem the ideal place for Feet action, so frug to the front here.
description_cy: Yn fwystfil o Coventry, mae Feet yn rhan o linach o gangiau seicadeilic Prydain. Efallai y byddwch chi’n clywed darnau o’r Beatles, the Coral neu Syd Barrett yma, ond nid yw Feet yn fasnachwyr retro, yn hytrach yn ffatri o syniadau gwallgof, yn llifo rhwng synau a genres cerddorol, ac yn gwneud hyn i gyd yn wên o glust i glust. Ers dod yn rhan o deulu Yala! Records, mae Felix White o label y Maccabees yn honni mai’r lle gorau i weld Feet yw mewn clwb nos neu mewn gŵyl gerddorol, felly cer i sefyll yn y blaen!

name: Flamingods
description: A virus sent around the world to infect all dancefloors, Flamingods are a band impossible not to groove to, music that mashes together psychedelia, rock, prog, African and Middle Eastern sounds and a whole load more into massive rhythmic shapes. With their roots both in Bahrain and Britain, Flamingods have been releasing records since 2012 (including an album for local legends Shape), finding an appropriate home with globetrotters Soundway Records, before hopping on to Moshi Moshi for latest album Levitate, all the while sending out their itchy, addictive and relentless music to the rest of the planet.
description_cy: Yn bla sydd wedi’i ladaenu o gwmpas pob llawr ddawnsio, mae Flamingods yn fand sy’n eich gorfodi i ddawnsio a grŵfio. Cerddoriaeth sy’n gyfuniad o seicadeilia, roc, prog, synau Affricanaidd a Dwyrain Canol gyda llwyth mwy o rhythmau a symudiadau enfawr, amrywiol. Gyda’u gwreiddiau ym Bahrain a Phrydain, mae Flamingods wedi bod yn rhyddhau albymau ers 2012 (gan gynnwys albym ar gwmni recordiau lleol, chwedlonol, Shape), cyn dod o hyd i gartref addas gyda Soundway Records, yna’n symud ymlaen at Moshi Moshi i ryddhau eu halbwm diweddaraf Levitate, ac yn y cyfamser yn parhau i rannu eu cerddoriaeth coslyd, caethiwus a di-baid i weddill y byd.

name: Foxxglove
description: Foxxglove is Cardiff-based artist, Ffion Murray’s project that blends stunningly moody pop with dark electronics, using her own experiences as the base of her songwriting. Foxxglove delivers her story with raw honesty and openness that recalls artists like Daughter or Novo Amor. 2019 has seen her debut her live shows, join Forté Project’s list of 10 acts, working with artist & producer Minas and will be releasing her single City in the autumn. We can’t wait to be a part of her exciting year!
description_cy: Mae Foxxglove yn gerddor o Gaerdydd, mae prosiect Ffion Murray yn plethu pop dwys, difridol gyda electronics tywyll yn defnyddio ei phrofiadau ei hun wrth fynd ati i ysgrifennu caneuon. Mae Foxxglove yn cynnig stori sy’n amrwd, onest ac agored sy\’n debyg i artistiaid eraill fel Daughter a Novo Amor. Perfformiodd mewn sawl gig byw yn ystod 2019, ymunodd â’r Forte Project a gweithiodd fel cerddor a chynhyrchydd i Minas. Bydd Foxxglove yn rhyddhau ei sengl ‘City’ yr Hydref hwn ac rydyn ni wedi’n dotio i fod yn rhan o’i blwyddyn cyffrous hi!

name: Francis Lung
description: Ex WU LYFer turned solo artist. Hailing from Manchester, the shadow of the melodic side of that city’s musical heritage looms large but doesn’t ever obscure his singular vision, encompassing influences stretching from Chilton to Cobain, and much in between. This year’s debut full length ‘A Dream Is U’ on Memphis Industries showcases his versatility perfectly.
description_cy: Mae Francis Lung yn ganwr/cyfansoddwr a chynhyrchydd â’r ddawn i chwarae sawl offeryn, o Fanceinion. Dechreuodd ysgrifennu a chasglu cerddoriaeth ar ôl dirywiad ei fand blaenorol WU LYF yn 2012. Rhyddhaodd ei EP cyntaf ‘Vol 1’ ar ei label ei hun ‘Songs Records’ ac yn 2015 disgrifiodd The Line Of Best Fit yr EP fel “antholeg o gyfansoddiadau meistrolgar, clasurol a thyner”. Canmoliwyd ei EP nesaf ‘Vol ||’ fel “melodïau hamddenol, meddylgar a threfniadau cymhleth sy’n gwegian mewn atmosffer ôl-bync”.

name: Free Love
description: Building a bigger utopia out of the mini-utopia that is Glasgow’s creative scene, Free Love may have changed their name from Happy Meals, but their mission remains the unchanged: achieving communal bliss through delirious music that takes in analogue acid, psychedelic krautrock and Italo dream disco. The duo of Suzi Rodden and Lewis Cook have held yoga afternoons and all night sleep events, but it’s their gigs that smack you in the face, with Rodden’s English and French-sung, feral dervish performances like a touchpaper to you soul. Man. Do not miss.
description_cy: Yn creu iwtopia allan o iwtopia llai sef sîn greadigol Glasgow, er bod Happy Meals wedi newid eu henw i Free Love, maent yn bwriadu gwneud union yr un peth – creu bliss cymunedol rhwng cerddoriaeth gorffwysol gyda asid analog, krautrock seicadelic a breuddwyd disco Italo. Mae Suzi Rodden a Lewis Cook wedi cynnal gwersi yoga yn y p’nawn a nosweithiau cysgu ond mae eu gigs yn llwyddo i’ch deffro gyda geiriau Ffrengig a Saesneg Rodden a pherfformiadau bydd yn cyffwrdd â’ch henaid. Peidiwch a methu hwn.

name: Gaffa Tape Sandy
description: Day-glo, sugar rush, excitable, shouty, indie-garage-rock-pop-punk par-excellence. You probably won’t be surprised that they’ve found a home from home with the equally giddy Alcopop! Records. Make sure you queue up nice and early to get down the front to shout along with them. Life affirming stuff.
description_cy: Ffurfiodd Gaffa Tape Sandy o ganlyniad i awch tri ffrind i wneud sŵn mawr a chyffrous. Tyfodd poblogrwydd y band yn gyflym ar ôl perfformio eu tiwns haentus, garej-pync/roc mewn sawl sioe byw. Mae ei EP cyntaf ‘Spring Killing’ wedi sicrhau eu bod yn perfformio yn Glastonbury eleni a’u sengl cyntaf ‘Beehive’ wedi derbyn cefnogaeth gan Huw Stephens ar ‘Tip of the Week’ ar Radio 1.

name: Ghostlawns
description: Ghostlawns are a Cardiff-based musical collective comprised of Andrew ‘Bernie’ Plain (Right Hand Left Hand), Gid Goundrey (Gulp), Dewi Parry and Jonny Brooks-Jones (various). Their eclectic blend of instrumentation brings to life a massive, atmospheric creature of electronica. Soon to have a full album to show off, for now the four piece give a showcase to the inner workings of their minds just for us.
description_cy: Casgliad o gerddorion o Gaerdydd yw Ghostlawns, gan gynnwys ‘Bernie’ Plain (Right Hand Left Hand), Gid Goundrey (Gulp), Dewi Parry a Jonny Brooks-Jones (amryw). Mae eu cymysg o sain offerynnol yn adfywio creadur o ddyfnderau electronica atmosfferig. Gydag albwm llawn i ddod yn fuan, mae’r pedwarawd am arddangos canlyniadau eu syniadau mewnol i ni!

name: Grace Lightman
description: Fifty years since Neil Armstrong and co signally failed to bring back any extraterrestrials lifeforms, Grace Lightman is here to inject not just some alien vibes, but some highly luxurious French disco space rock alien vibes. ‘Silver Eater’ is the debut LP the Londoner Lightman has just released, and it’s a DIY concept album about a marooned alien navigating the weird Earth life of humans. That these musings are wrapped in gloriously bubbling technicolour krautpop that Goldfrapp, Air or Add N To (X) would be proud of is a definite bonus. This weekend’s decadent, indulgent treat.
description_cy: Pumdeg mlynedd ers i Neil Amstrong & co fethu dod a unrhyw fath o estroniaid nôl i’r ddaear, mae Grace Lightman yma i wystrellu vibes estroniaid mewn i’n bywydau, ond nid vibes estroniaid cyffredin mohonynt, ond vibes estroniaid Ffrenging, disgo a roc arallfydol. Mae ei LP cyntaf ‘Silver Eater’ yn albym DIY am estron sy’n trio deall defodau rhyfedd bodau dynol ar y ddaear. Mae’r caneuon yma wedi eu gorchuddio yn ofalus gan krautpop o bob lliw y byddau Goldfrapp, Air neu Add N To (X) yn falch o weld. Dyma’ch pwdin i’r penwythnos.

name: Gruff Rhys
description: Corner any gaggle of drinkers in any pub in Wales, ask them for their favourite Gruff Rhys moments, and try and keep up. Is it the Super Furry Animals years, or before them in Ffa Coffi Pawb or after in Neon Neon? The Incredible, Insatiable Candylion stage play? How about the documentary travelogues, Separado! and American Interior? Clearing half of Clwb via his collaboration with Brazilian VCR repairman Tony Da Gatorra? Crunching carrots for Misty’s Big Adventure? Or simply being an unending source of inspiration, an artist not just responsible for continued excellent solo and collaborative music but also the urge to do more, in all directions, in whatever interesting ways possible? Probably that last one, and the hair.
description_cy: Eistedda i lawr gyda rhywun yng Nghymru mewn tafarn, a gofynna iddyn nhw beth yw ei hoff adeg Gruff Rhys, a phob lwc i ti wrth i ti drio dilyn y sgwrs. Ai blynyddoedd y Super Furry Animals, neu cyn hynny yn Ffa Coffi Pawb neu ar ôl yn Neon Neon? Ai perfformiad llwyfan The Incredible, Instatiable Candylion? Neu beth am y ddogfen deithiol Seperado! a America Interior? Yn llenwi Clwb wrth iddo berfformio ar y cyd gyda’r gŵr o Brasil Tony Da Gatorra? Yn crensian ar foronen yn Misty’s Big Adventure? Neu yn syml iawn, bod yn ysbrydoliaeth ddiddiwedd a cherddor sydd nid yn unig yn creu gwaith unigol a grŵp anhygoel, ond sydd â’r gallu a’r awch i wneud mwy, mewn sawl cyfeiriad, yn y ffordd fwyaf diddorol erioed? Yr un olaf siŵr o fod, neu’r gwallt.

name: Gwilym
description: The ‘Best Band of 2018’ according to the readers of Selar – Gwilym are going from strength to strength following their success at Selar Awards back in February, where they won 5 awards. Their catchy indie-pop songs never fail to get the crowd dancing!
description_cy: Band Gorau 2018’ yn ôl darllenwyr y Selar – mae Gwilym yn mynd o nerth i nerth yn dilyn eu llwyddiant yng Ngwobrau’r Selar ym mis Chwefror lle ennillon nhw bum gwobr. Tydy eu caneuon indi pop bachog byth yn methu â chael y dorf i ddawnsio!

name: Haze
description: Bringing the bovver boy rock to Bristol and beyond for a year or two now, Haze’s lurching garage racket is thick with dense allusions to history and politics (previous subjects include deification of flawed historical figures and Trotsky’s time in Mexico), while maintaining a queasy malevolence and swagger. Now on Hate Hate Hate Records, previously home to Fat White Family and the Wytches, prospects for conquering Britain, one Spoons at a time, look good.
description_cy: Yn dilyn blynyddoedd o ddiflastod mewn pentref bach yn yml Buckinghamshire, mae Haze erbyn hyn yn byw ym Mryste ac yn creu cerddoriaeth cadarn, cryf a brysiog. Mae eu sengl diweddaraf ‘St John’ yn drwm â llinell fas cryf yn rhedeg drwyddo gyda’r geiriau wedi’u hysbrydoli gan amser Trotsky yn Mexico gyda Frida Kahlo.

name: Heavy Lungs
description: Rising from the swamp of Bristol’s high-volume bands a couple of years ago, debut single Poster Boy, with its strained dynamics and almost rockabilly guitars, showed a band far from merely punk or rock and roll. The band play with space and post punk timing, while vocalist Danny Nedelko (yes yes, subject of that Idles song) has a blank roar in the vein of great European art punks like Iceage. Bang your head to all of it.
description_cy: Yn codi o gors y nifer o fandiau o Bryste cwpl o flynyddoedd yn ôl, mae sengl cyntaf y band, Poster Boy yn diwn deinameg dan straen gyda llinellau gitars sy’n agos at rockabilly, sy’n cyflwyno band yn bell i ffwrdd o gydymffurfio a pync neu roc a rôl yn unig. Maent yn chwarae gydag amseru post-punk, tra bod y canwr Danny Nedelko (ie, ie, testun Y gân Idles yna) yn rhuo i’r cynulleidfaoedd.

name: Himalayas
description: Himalayas are an indie rock garage band from Cardiff consisting of  James Goulourn (drums), Mike Griffiths (guitar and vocals) Lois Heaps (bass) and Joe Williams (guitar and vocals). The band create a cinematic sound in a dreamy style. Their thick guitars,
description_cy: Band indi garej roc o Gaerdydd yw Himalayas gyda James Goulourn (drymiau), Mike Griffiths (gitar a llais), Lois Heaps (bass) a Joe Williams (gitar a llais). Mae’r band yn creu sŵn sinematig a steil sy’n sicr o adael y gynulleidfa mewn breuddwyd. Mae ei gitars trwm, lleisiau gwych a’u halawon anthemig yn sicr o lwyddo i ddenu sylw pawb.

name: HMLTD
description: Forged together by some of South Wales’ best known and best loved musicians in the DIY punk scene. Honest Thieves are a trio built of members of bands like Pipedream and Dividers. Their origin is clear when you listen to their music, their debut EP “Ineptitude” still has a footprint of those old bands, but now strengthened with their hard gruff hardcore exterior.
description_cy: Does dim byd diflas am y band yma o Lundain. Mae HMLTD yn gelf byw gyda glam rock electroneg afreolus yn toddi’n berffaith gyda gwisgoedd, props a’u ffordd o fyw i greu un anghenfil di-dor. Mae caneuon fel ‘Stained’ a ‘To The Door’ yn llosgi’n llachar fel gwibfaen, fel Bowie ag Adam Ant yn llosgi clwb nos danddaearol. Does dim dianc.

name: Holy Fuck
description: Our not so secret set…Holy Fuck are a legendary live electronica quartet from Canada. With their 5th album release on its way the band’s high energy live shows put you in a “do I bop or headbang” limbo land. We suggest you do both!

name: Honest Thieves
description: Forged together by some of South Wales’ best known and best loved musicians in the DIY punk scene. Honest Thieves are a trio built of members of bands like Pipedream and Dividers. Their origin is clear when you listen to their music, their debut EP “Ineptitude” still has a footprint of those old bands, but now strengthened with their hard gruff hardcore exterior.
description_cy: Ein set ‘cyfrinachol’…Mae Holy Fuck yn fand electronica swnllyd o Ganada sydd wedi gwneud enw i’w hunain. Gyda’u pumed album ar y ffordd, mae’u set bywiog yn neud i chi gwestiynnu “ydw i’n bopio neu headbangio i hwn?” – ni’n awgrymu neud y ddau!

name: Hotel Lux
description: From the same rowdy South London scene as Shame and Goat Girl, Hotel Lux are the grubby documentarians of the area, turning their lens on boozer life and violent reprobates via pubby, arty guitar rock. At their lighter end, something like The English Disease recalls a lairy Half Man Half Biscuit, but the dark heart of Hotel Lux are songs like Daddy and The Last Hangman, bruising excavations of society that build from simple sounds to dense rackets of noise and shouting.
description_cy: O’r un lle swnllyd yn Ne Llundain y mae Shame a Goat Girl yn dod, Hotel Lux yw’r bobl sy’n dogfennu’r ardal yma i’r dim, yn esbonio eu bywydau boozy trwy roc gitar greadigol. Ar ochr fwy ysgafn y band y mae caneuon fel The English Disease a Half Man Half Biscuit, ond yna ar ochr dywyll y band cawn Daddy a The Last Hangman. Sŵn trwm, dwys sy’n sicr o gleisio’ch clustiau.

name: Housewives
description: Atonal post punk you can dance to, kind of, Housewives are half junkshop robots, half sleek guitar technicians, and all about a relentless, rhythmic, twitchy racket. A lot of weird noises have gone into their many releases, for Faux Discx, Rocket Recordings and Blank Editions: you may hear high-pitched keyboard pips, homemade instruments, squeaked-up vocals or, on latest single SmttnKttns, a kind of mutant sax disco no-one in their right mind could cop off to. It’s cult time.
description_cy: Cerddoriaeth ôl-bync y gallwch chi ddawnsio iddo, fi’n credu, mae Housewives yn hanner robots, hanner technegwyr gitar, ac maent i gyd yn creu sŵn dirdynnol, rhythmig a gwych. Clywn sawl sŵn rhyfedd yn eu cerddoriaeth diweddaraf; sŵn allweddellau uchel gyda lleisiau gwychlyd  y cewch chi yn Faux Discx, Rocket Recordings a Blank Editions. Yna yn ei sengl diweddaraf, SmttnKttns mae presennoldeb sacsoffon a vibes disgo yn amlwg trwy’r gân.

name: Howl & The Hum (THE)
description: Having slowly built their reputation with gigs that reach an almost Future Islands-level of intensity, York band The Howl And The Hum are crossing thresholds to larger festivals and anticipated releases. Their music is a literate and dark take on art rock, not afraid to add an electronic pulse or swooping falsetto. If you’re a fanatic, rather than a fan, of Editors, Twilight Sad or Frightened Rabbit, you’re probably queuing up already.
description_cy: Wrth i rai o’u gigs gyrraedd bron iawn yr un lefel o ddwysedd â gigs Future Islans, mae’r band o Efrog The Howl and The Hum yn croesi draw i wyliau mwy ac yn bwriadu rhyddhau gwaith hir disgwyliedig. Yma gwelwn eu fersiwn tywyll hwy o gelf roc, heb ofni ychwanegu pwls electronig na ffalsetto syfrdanol. Os wyt ti’n ffanatig, yn hytrach na ffan o’r Editors, Twilight Sad neu Frightened Rabbit, dylse ti fod yn ciwio nawr.

name: Hyll
description: Their name translates as ‘ugly’, they have an ugly-looking face as their profile picture, and their music is… a spirited and youthful take on indie rock. A Cardiff treat for a few years now, Hyll still remain an energetic, scrappy bunch, their rattling racket best enjoyed on recent EP ‘Rhamant’, where the clatter of early Pavement meets the heavy goofiness of Mac DeMarco or Dinosaur Jr, for maximum fun times.
description_cy: Er bod eu llun proffil yr un mor hyll a’u henw, mae’r gerddoriaeth Hyll yn…  ifanc, chwareus a gwych. Yn un o ddanteithion Caerdydd ers rhaid blynyddoedd, mae Hyll dal i fod yn gang o fechgyn sy’n creu cerddoriaeth indi-roc, clywir yr agwedd tafod yn y boch yma yn glir yn eu EP diweddaraf ‘Rhamant’. Sŵn sy’n debyg i Pavement ond sydd â’r un ffoelineb â Mac DeMarco neu Dinosaur Jr.

name: Indian Queens
description: Like a dream unfolding in slow motion, the songs of Indian Queens have a languid, mesmeric quality. Formed in Hackney Wick, London, by guitarist sisters Jennifer and Katherine O’Neil, plus old friend Mat on drums, it makes perfect sense for the band’s music to be affiliated with Bella Union, the label set up by the Cocteau Twins’ Simon Raymonde. Now on the Cool Thing label, newer songs like You Came Over Late show the band hitting a fine stride of dark shoegaze pop, all loose vocals, slow tempos and lush washes of sound.
description_cy: Fel breuddwyd sy’n datblygu’n ara’ deg, mae caneuon Indian Queens yn fesmeraidd, llyfn ac yn gwbwl hyfryd. Wedi’u sefydlu yn Hacni Wick, Llundain, mae’r chwiorydd Jennifer a Katherine O’Neil (gitar) a’i hen ffrind Mat (drymiau) yn gysylltiedig â Bella Union, label cafodd ei sefydlu gan Simon Raymonde, Cacteau Twins. Erbyn heddiw, mae Indian Queens ar y label Cool Things, ac wedi rhyddhau caneuon newydd fel You Came Over Late, cân sy’n arddangos gallu arbennig y band o greu shoegaze pop, tempos diddorol a sŵn hollol hyfryd ac unigryw.

name: Jack Perrett
description: Newport’s premier representative on earth, Jack Perrett combines universal rock and roll behaviour with constantly repping his South Wales origins (he famously went semi-viral with his Parklife pastiche and paean to the city, Portlife). Jack Perrett songs are pure scally good times, a Liam Gallagher-esque attitude and massive earworm tunes. Occasionally lumbered with the Britpop tag, this is more like the irrepressible spirit of street level rock, from The Jam to Oasis to Jake Bugg, in a cracking tracksuit.
description_cy: Cynrychiolwr blaengar Casnewydd, mae Jack Perrett yn uno ymddygiad roc a rôl byd-eang tra’n cynrychioli ei wreiddiau De Cymru (bron iddo fynd yn viral gyda’i pastiche Parklife, Portlife). Mae ei ganeuon yn bur o amser da mewn steil Liam Gallagher a thiwns enfawr.

name: Jerskin Fendrix
description: An alien, from Birmingham, who writes operas in his spare time. The electronic misfit in the Brixton Windmill scene centred around Black Midi, Jerskin Fendrix releases songs rarely, taking the time to craft weirdo futurist pop that’s maddening, disturbing and addictive in equal measures. Songs like ‘Swamp’ or ‘Onigiri’ are soups of distorted vocals, swerving time signatures and sudden bursts of noise, Fendrix riding these beasts like Arca on fiendish poppers. Catch him in a net and don’t let him leave.
description_cy: Mae Jerskin Fendrix yn ganwr a chynhyrchydd avant-pop o Sir Amwythig. O ganlyniad i’w berfformiadau byw dramatig mae Fendrix wedi cefnogi amryw o artistiaid o GFOTY i Hanna Diamond, Japanese Breakfast a Black Midi.

name: Jockstrap
description: Completely unmissable electronic weirdos from London here, as likely to give you crystalised snares or a 21-piece orchestral suite. Formed at the Guildhall School Of Music and Drama, former home of Mica Levi, Tirzah and more, Jockstrap is Georgia Ellery and Taylor Skye, creating soundscapes that sound like ‘50s Hollywood string sections one minute, Bjork-style avant garde torch songs the next, the PC Music or Arca-grade electronic minimalism straight after. Dark, sensuous, and totally unpredictable.
description_cy: Mae’n rhaid i chi weld y weirdos electronig yma o Lundain. Ar ôl cwrdd yn Guildhall School Of Music and Drama, mae Georgia Ellery a Taylor Skye yn creu sŵn sy’n swnio weithiau fel soundscape llinynnau o’r 50au, yna fel caneuon avant garde Bjork-aidd yna fel tiwns electronig minimalistaidd. Yn dywyll, synhwyrol ac yn gwbl annisgwyl.

name: John Mouse
description: 5 albums and a gazillion shows in and John MOuse is showing no signs of slowing down, let alone stopping. His live shows are nothing but entertaining. There isn’t a piece of furniture in a Cardiff venue that John MOuse hasn’t climbed upon. Constantly collaborating with others means John MOuse cannot (and assuming, will not) be put in a box – melding influences and hopping genres, the two consistent things in John MOuse’s output is entertainment and cracking song-writing. Join the party.
description_cy: Ar ôl 5 album a baziliwn o sioeau ers dechrau yn 2006, dyw John MOuse ddim yn dangos unrhyw arwyddion o arafu lawr. Mae ei sioeau byw yn hollol adloniadol a difyr. Does dim un darn o ddodrefn mewn gigfan yng Nghaerdydd dyw John MOuse heb ddringo. Yn gyson yn cydweithio gyda artistiaid eraill, mae John MOuse yn amhosib i gategoreiddio – yn toddi’i ddylanwadau.

name: Josiah Konder
description: It’s clear that Denmark as a country has something in the water that’s growing some genius musicians rife with character and a particular grim moodyness. They released their debut album Songs For The Stunned last year, shortly before heading off on an incredible tour with Denmarks post punk pioneers, Iceage. With a second album just about to drop on Third Coming Records, we’re poised to receive them and experience their unique potion of  dark post punk and gothic folk music one again.
description_cy: Mae’n glir fod gan Denmarc rhywbeth yn y dŵr sy’n tyfu athrylithoedd rhemp ar oriog. Fe ryddhawyd y band eu album cyntaf, Songs For The Stunned llynedd ac mae’r ail album ar y ffordd yn barod! Ni’n barod i groesawu’u moddion unigryw o post-punk tywyll a cherddoriaeth gwerin gothig.

name: Just Mustard
description: Irish 5 piece who brew up a heady blend of lively atmospheric noise scree and downbeat electronics, seasoned with delicate shoegazey male/female vocal interplay. Their RTÉ Choice Music Prize shortlisted 2018 debut album “Wednesday” received deserved praise for it’s huge sound which is, obviously, showcased and amplified by their dynamic live shows.
description_cy: Mae Just Mustard yn fand pump aelod o Dundalk, Iwerddon. Yn plethu a chreu eu cymysgedd unigryw o sŵn trip hop ac electronic, mae eu halbym cyntaf ‘Wednesday’, a gafodd ei ryddhau ar Pizza Pizza Records, wedi creu argraff fawr ar y sîn gerddorol trwy gael ei enwebu fel ‘Albym y Flwyddyn’ yn Choice Music Prize 2018. Yn dilyn perfformio’n fyw yn Other Voices, Hard Working Class Hereoes a dwy daith cendlaethol yn 2018, bydd Just Mustard yn teithio dros Iwerddon, Prydain ac Ewrop yn 2019 – felly sicrhewch eich bod chi’n eu gweld yng Ngwŷl Sŵn eleni!

name: KINGKHAN
description: Cardiff is often praised for being such a complex potion of all varieties of music, all sprouting up at once, all genres, all types of musicians. From funk, to punk; there’s no end to it. King Kahn is the spearhead of Cardiffs indie rap, and meloncholy trap scene. All selp produced and self recorded, he uses fun, relatable and nostalgic sounding production styles and samples to splice together his own personal indie rap smoothie. It’s something different, and if you’re after something fresh and new, you know where to go.
description_cy: Mae Kingkhan ar frig sîn indie rap a trap Caerdydd. Wedi’i gynhyrchu a’i recordio i gyd ei hun, mae Kingkhan yn defnyddio elfennau hwyl, hiraethus a trosglwyddadwy yn ei waith cynhurchu a’i samplau i greu smŵddi rap dinesig ei hun. Mae’n rhywbeth gwahanol ag os chi’n chwilio am rhywbeth ffres a newydd, rhowch gynnig ar Kingkhan yn ystod Sŵn!

name: Katy J Pearson
description: Freshly signed to Heavenly Recordings, it’s easy to see why Katy J Pearson is catching everyone’s ears. With a unique talent in creating sticky melodies that stay in the brain, Katy J Pearson writes songs that reflect her time growing up in the middle of hilly West England. After exploring the world of songwriting with dream-pop duet Ardyn, her new solo project focuses on portraying the weird and wonderful world around her. Conveying glorious nostalgia in a busy world.
description_cy: Mae Katy J Pearson newydd gael ei chipio gan Heavenly Recordings, a mae’n hawdd gweld pam! Gyda ddawn unigryw i greu alawon sy’n glynu’n syth mewn i’r ymenydd, mae Katy J Pearson yn sgwennu caneuon sy’n adlewyrchu’i hamser yn tyfu lan yng nghanol bryniau Gorllewin Lloegr. Ar ôl ffori’r byd o sgwennu caneuon gyda’r ddeuawd dream-pop, Ardyn, mae’i phrosiect solo newydd yn canolbwyntio ar bortreadu’r byd rhyfeddol o’i chwmpas. Yn cyfleu hiraeth gogoneddus mewn byd mawr prysur.

name: Kidsmoke
description: Wrexham’s Kidsmoke have packed in an impressive amount in the few years since forming. An early song, Take Me To The River, found its way into and episode of Black Mirror. The Cure’s Robert Smith asked them to join his curation of the Meltdown festival. FOCUS Wales took them to Canada for the Breakout West shindig, where an invite to play SXSW came their way. But all these CV details are built on Kidsmoke’s lush music, a dreamy mix of clean guitars, intertwining vocals and irrepressible, nagging melodies.
description_cy: Ers cychwyn ar ei gyrfa gerddorol ychydig flynyddoedd yn ôl, mae Kidsmoke wedi bod yn brysur iawn. Cafodd un o’u caneuon cynharaf Take Me To The River, ei chwarae ar bennod o Black Mirror. Gofynnwyd iddynt gan Robert Smith o The Cure os byddai diddordeb ganddyn nhw fod yn rhan o’i brosiect curadu yn Meltdown Festival. Aeth FOCUS Wales â nhw i Ganada ar gyfer y shindig Breakout West, lle estynnwyd gwahoddiad iddynt chwarae yn SXSW. Ond mae’r holl gyfleoedd yma’n deillio o gerddoriaeth hyfryd Kidsmoke, cymysgedd breuddwydiol o gitârs glân, lleisiau perffaith ac alawon anorchfygol.

name: Kim Hon
description: A new project formed around members of Y Reu – Iwan Fon and Iwan Llyr – Kim Hon may only be one single old, but have already injected near-illegal amounts of swagger into the Welsh music scene. The single in question (released on the great Libertino label) is ‘Twti Ffrwti’, and is a beast of electronic beats and guitars, an addictive and not entirely serious splurge that calls to mind everything debauched from baggy, big beat to wonky hip hop like Tystion. Your party is here.
description_cy: Ar ôl iddynt rhyddhau un sengl drwy label Libertino ac i ni weld y band yn perfformio yn Twrw Trwy’r Dydd a Dawns Barlys Aberteifi, ni wedi cwympo mewn cariad gyda’r band hudolus a gwallgof yma. Yn cyfuno curiadau electronig, guitars caethiwus a swagger pur, mae Kim Hon wedi creu sŵn sy’n atgoffaol o ‘big beat’ y 90au, hip hop wonci ag indie roc dewr a hyderus. Mae’r parti wedi cyrraedd.

name: Krush Puppies
description: Kicking their way through a music scene rife with emotive, grungy indie rock bands like CherryGlazer, Surf Curse, and Forth Wanderers. Krush Puppies are making large strides, touring constantly and making sure they are heard in an echo chamber that’s so easy to get lost in as a new artist. Busy touring with amazing bands like Body Type and Drahla, Krush Puppies are definitely a new band to watch.
description_cy: Mae Krush Puppies wedi bod yn cicio’i ffordd trwy’r sîn gerddorol sydd yn llawn bandiau grungy a indie fel CherryGlazer, Surf Curse a Forth Wanderes ac maent wedi bod yn gadael ei ôl, wrth deithio yn aml a gwneud yn siŵr ei bod nhw’n cael ei chlywed. Trwy deithio gyda bandiau anhygoel eraill fel Body Type a Drahla, mae Krush Puppies yn sicr yn fand i’w gweld yn fyw.

name: Lauran Hibberd
description: Humorous, infectious and charismatic in equal measure, Isle Of Wight’s rising sensation Lauran Hibberd thrives once more with anthemic single Hoochie, firmly solidifying her growing status within the UK’s emerging indie elite. Buzzing across the airwaves with BBC Radio 1’s Annie Mac, Huw Stephens and Jack Saunders all throwing their support behind the young musician, Lauran’s witty, off-kilter approach continues to attract glowing praise from the online community (The Line Of Best Fit, Clash, The 405) and welcome comparisons to contemporaries including Courtney Barnett and Phoebe Bridgers.
description_cy: Bag o siwgr gyda digon o hoelion, mae cerddoriaeth Lauren Hibbard yn dwyllodrus o ddiniwed. Guitar pop caethiwus ceir yma, sy’n drwm gyda hooks a hiwmor. Mae’r artist o Ynys Wyth wedi cael lle ar rhestrau chwarae Spotify a BBC yn barod a mae’n hawdd deall pam gyda’r tracks sy’n byrlymu gyda melodi a ffraeth.

name: Lazarus Kane
description: Who is Lazarus Kane you ask? Honestly, he’s a mystery to us too! Rumour has it that Lazarus who may have once lived in America may now reside in London where we’ve heard that he can be found dabbling with synthesisers and drum machines whilst sat upon a time machine he built himself. Some even say he’s in Katy J Pearsons band. Theres only one way to find out.
description_cy: Pwy yw Lazarus Kane? Cwestiwn da, mae e’n ddirgel i ni hefyd! Mae sïon bod Lazarus wedi byw yn America unwaith a nawr mae sôn bod e’n byw yn Llundain lle mae modd ei glywed yn chwarae o gwmpas gyda synthesisers a peiriannau drums tra’n eistedd ar beiriant amser nath e’ adeiladu ei hun. Ma’ rhai hyd yn oed yn gweud ei fod e’n aelod o fand Katy J Pearson. Dim ond un ffordd sydd i ffeindio mas.

name: Lice
description: Probably the most atonal and scabrous of Bristol’s noise scene, Lice songs generally involve discordant guitar screams, pummelling drums, and, over the top, Alistair Shuttleworth’s deranged and anxious ramblings. Like post punk irritants the Birthday Party or Butthole Surfers, Lice know it feels good when it’s horrible, and this dedication to ear bashing has led to a deal with Joe from Idles’ Balley Records, and the EP collection It All Worked Out Great, which is perfect to annoy all family members with.
description_cy: Efallai un o’r bands fwyaf digywair a chrafangllyd o sîn noise Bryste, mae caneuon LICE fel arfer yn cynnwys gitârs yn sgrechian, drymiau’n pwmpio ac ramblo pryderus a gwyllt Alistair Shuttleworth. Byddwch yn barod am set nrhagweladwy gan y punks swnllyd!

name: Liz Lawrence
description: Liz Lawrence has packed a lot into the last decade. 2012 saw the release of her first album, the folk pop jewel ‘Bedroom Hero’, before she formed the electro duo Cash + David, and before she spent the best part of two years touring the world with Bombay Bicycle Club. All of which leads to 2019, and the release of new album ‘Pity Party’, a thoughtful, mature but ultimately celebratory slice of present day pop. Recent single ‘Navigator’ lays it out: a building torch song that crashes into a nagging, strident chorus, vulnerable but dead tough.
description_cy: Mae Liz Lawrence wedi bod yn brysur iawn dros y ddegawd ddiwethaf. Rhyddhaodd Liz ei halbym gyntaf ‘Bedroom Hero’ yn 2012, yna darganfyddodd hi’r ddeuawd electro Cash + David ac yna treuliodd hi bron i ddwy flynedd yn teithio’r byd gyda Bombay Bicycle Club. Ond eleni, yn 2019, rhyddhaodd ei halbym newydd ‘Pity Party’. Yn yr albym hwn gwelwn gyfanwaith o gerddoriaeth meddylgar sy’n dathlu pob agwedd o bop. Mae ei sengl diweddaraf ‘Navigator’ fel fflam obeithiol ar y dechrau cyn i’r gytgan  grasho mewn i’r gân gan greu sŵn caled, bregus ond hyderus.

name: Look Mum No Computer
description: Possibly the only act at this year’s Swn to bring an interactive synth bicycle,  Look Mum No Computer is the deviant project of Sam Battle, an experiment in fun and modified instruments now seemingly out of control. Since leaving previous band Zibra, Battle’s tinkering has drawn a cult following: as well as the playable BMX, there is the Furby Organ (4.4 million views and counting), a Gameboy orchestra, plus demonstrations of hacked stylophones, bibles and God knows what else. Part electropop showman, part rave Techniquest, overall it’s just a party.
description_cy: Efallai mai hwn yw’r unig berfformiwr yn Sŵn sy’n dod â beic synth rhyngweithiol i’r llwyfan. Mae Look Mum No Computer yn brosiect gan Sam Battle, yn arbrawf hwyl sy’n addasu offerynnau mewn i bethau hollol gwallgof. Ers gadael ei fand baenorol Zibra, mae addasiadau Zibra wedi creu rhyw fath o gwlt: yn ogystal i’r BMX sy’n gallu cael ei chwarae ma na Organ Furby (wedi’i wylio 4.4 miliwn gwaith), cerddorfa Gameboy, perfformiadau ar stylophones wedi’i hacio, beiblau a duw a wyr beth arall! Yn hanner electropop, hanner rêf yn Techniquest a 100% parti.

name: Lunar Bird
description: The psychedelic trail from Italy to Cardiff might not be the most well-trodden, but Lunar Bird’s relocation at least gives us some gloriously addled, lush dreampop. Based around Roberta Musillami and Eliseo Di Malto’s vocals and synth swirls, recent EP Daydreamer is a delicious treat, recalling Goldfrapp, Melody’s Echo Chamber, or even Kate Bush’s more gothic touches. Get enchanted.
description_cy: Diolch byth y ffeindiodd Lunar Bird y llwybr seicadelig o’r Eidal i Gaerdydd.  Wedi nythu yng Nghaerdydd erbyn hyn mae Lunar Bird yn creu dreampop anhygoel. Yn seiliedig ar leisiau Roberta Musillami ac Eliseo Di Malto, mae eu EP diweddaraf yn gyfanwaith blasus sy’n debyg i Goldfrapp, Melody’s Echo Chamber, neu hyd yn oed elfennau gothig Kate Bush.

name: Macy
description: Another young pop prodigy under Forté Project’s wing, Macy is already making a name for herself in the Welsh pop scene with appearances at Focus Wales and Hub Festival. Recently, she’s been working hard developing her dark pop and honing her craft by deconstructing pop songs, collaborating with producers and experimenting with the capabilities of the studio. You can witness some of her own powerful twists on pop hits on her Soundcloud. Look out for her forthcoming single, ‘Cinema’.
description_cy: Yn aelod arall o’r Prosiect Forte, mae Macy wedi dod yn enw cyfarwydd o fewn y sîn pop Cymreig ar ôl perfformio yn Focus Wales a Gwyl Hub. Yn ddiweddar, bu’n gweithio’n galed yn datblygu ei pop tywyll ac yn mireinio ei chrefft wrth ddatgymalu caneuon pop, gweithio gyda chynhyrchwyr gwahanol ac arbrofi gyda ffiniau stiwdio traddodiadol. Ewch i wrando ar ganeuon pop poblogaidd yn cael eu plygu a’u troi gan Macy ar ei Soundcloud. Cadwch lygaid allan am ei sengl nesaf ‘Cinema’.

name: Melin Melyn
description: Lovely psychedelic country pop from these London based Cardiff and North Walians. Their vintage-country-surf-twang and songs packed with a cast of curious characters will leave fans of Euros Childs / Gorkys etc. beaming from ear to ear. With their debut EP you can get some idea of the melodic zing they are capable of.
description_cy: Mae Melin Melyn yn creu pop vintage bachog ag ecsentrig sy’n adrodd straeon rhyfedd, fel rhaglen plant seicadelig. Wrth gyfuno elfennau surf, gwerin a psychedelia hafaidd, mae’r band yn creu naws chwilfrydig sy’n barod i esgyn o un byd hudol i’r llall.

name: Modern Habits
description: Local three piece Modern Habits put their mind, body and soul into churning out their unique breed of cathartic post punk. Their music is personal and genuine and specific to the daily trials of their lives. They just want their audience to feel and relate and be moved as they play, and hopefully you will.
description_cy: Mae’r triawd lleol Modern Habits yn rhoi eu meddwl, corff ac enaid i greu eu cymysg unigryw o ol-pync cathartig. Mae eu cerddoriaeth yn bersonol, dilys ac yn benodol i’w sialens fywydol. Maent dim ond eisiau i’w cynulleidfa i deimlo ac uniaethu wrth iddynt chwarae, a ni’n gobeithio y byddech chi!

name: Mr
description: The latest project from Mark Roberts, the guitarist and founder of a string of Welsh icons (Y Cyrff, Catatonia, Y Ffyrc, The Earth), MR is Mark solo, and Oesoedd is his debut album (and so anticipated it sold out its initial run in three days). You can see the progression through all of his acts arriving here: Oesoedd fits battered but classic songwriting and flashes of brass and black humour into its 12 tracks, for a happy, beloved return.
description_cy: Prosiect diweddaraf yr arloswr y sîn gerddorol yng nghymru, Mark Roberts (Y Cyrff, Catatonia, Y Ffyrc, The Earth), yw MR. Fe werthodd album cyntaf MR mas mewn tridiau! Gallwch weld dilyniant trwy bob un o’i actau yma: mae Oesoedd yn ffitio’r ysgrifennu clasurol gyda fflachiau o offerynnau pres a hiwmor tywyll yn ei 12 trac. Dychweliad hyfryd ag annwyl gan yr eicon pwysig yma.

name: Murder Capital (THE)
description: At first glance the dark and gloomy foreboding post-punk of this Dublin quintet might make you assume a bleak lyrical worldview however there is always hope and tenderness not far from the murky surface. Their debut album produced by the legendary Flood makes a valiant attempt at bottling the lightning of the sheer intensity and prowling menace of their live shows.
description_cy: Petai chi’n mynd i weld The Murder Capital yn fyw, nid trymder, llymder na chynddaredd y caneuon fyddai’n denu’ch sylw ond yr eiliadau fwyaf eithriadol o dynerwch.
