Cafodd eu halbym cyntaf ‘When I Have Fears’ ei recordio dros Spring With Flood (PJ Harvey, Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds, New Order ayyb) ac yn yr albym fe welwn ni’r tynerwch yma yn glir; yn glais piws ar benglin caled yr adfywiad ôl-bync.

name: Mystic Peach
description: Fruit come in all sorts of mysterious shapes and sizes, but this punnet comes in the shape of three indie rockers from Southampton. Mystic Peach create tasty slacker pop, bouncing from crunching guitars, bodacious choruses and tuneful melodies.
description_cy: Dyma fand o Southampton sy’n creu slacker pop blasus sy’n bownsio o guitars crensiog, cytganau craff ag alawon swynol. Dewch i weld y ffrwyth direglus yma!

name: Natty Paynter
description: Story-telling is at the forefront of Cardiff’s Natty Paynter’s song-writing as she delves into exploring her craft. On ‘Bird’ she strips everything back to the absolute minimum and let’s her haunting, fragile vocals do the work. On ‘Astronaut’ she shows-off her ability to craft a delightfully enchanting melody. At such a young age, her offering so far is outstanding – this is just the beginning for this promising artist.
description_cy: Wrth fynd ati i ysgrifennu cerddoriaeth, mae adrodd stori yn nodwedd holl-bwysig i Natty Paynter. Yn ‘Bird’ mae’n llwyddo i gadw popeth yn finimilistaidd and yn gadael i’w llais bregus a brawychus wneud y gwaith. Yn ‘Astonaut’ gwelwn Paynter yn arddangos ei dawn arbennig o greu melodi arbennig. Er yn ifanc, mae ei gwaith hyd yn hyd yn anhygoel – dim ond cychwyn ei siwrne yw hyn.

name: Nilüfer Yanya
description: Nilüfer Yanya has been composing songs in her head since she was 6 years old, and has been writing songs on guitar since she was 12, but it took time for her to gain the confidence to show her music to anyone. Once she did, this was her response – “it was horrendous, I loved it”. She thanks her creative home and family for encouraging her and pushing her to release and perform her music.
description_cy: Mae Nilüfer Yanya wedi bod yn cyfansoddi caneuon yn ei phen ers yn chwe mlwydd oed, ac wedi bod yn ysgrifennu caneuon ar y gitar ers yn 12, ond cymerodd hi amser hir iddi fagu hyder i ddangos ei cherddoriaeth i unrhywun. Unwaith iddi ddangos ei gwaith dyma oedd ei hymateb – “Roedd e’n erchyll, nes i garu e”. Mae’n diolch i’w haelwyd a’u theulu greadigol am ei hannog a’i gwthio i ryddhau a pherfformio ei cherddoriaeth.

name: Obey Cobra
description: The South Wales psychedelic super group Obey Cobra are carrying the local doom/metal scene on the weight of their backs currently. Converging the worlds of doom metal, stoner rock and electronic ambience. Fronted by singer Kate Woodward who projects her haunting ephemeral voice over a slow, deep and hammering backbeat, this brings to mind other artists like Chelsea Woolf who’s combination of gothic doom rock and ambient siren song is definitely comparable to say the least. Okay Cobra will definitely be one of the heaviest and darkest acts at Sŵn this year and definitely not one to miss.
description_cy: Mae’r swpyr-grŵp yma, Obey Cobra yn dod o Gaerdydd ac maent yn cario’r sîn metal/dŵm yn drwm ar eu hysgwyddau. Yn cyfuno cerddoriaeth metal dŵm, roc stoner gyda ambience electronig. Wedi’u harwain gan y cantoers Kate Woodward sy’n taflu eu llais brawychus dros guriadau araf trwm a dwfn mae’r sŵn yn ymdebygi i sŵn unigryw a gothig Chelsea Woolf. Cobra bydd un o fandiau mwyaf trwm a thywyll Sŵn felly mae’n rhaid i chi weld nhw, iawn?!

name: Orchards
description: The trojan horse on Big Scary Monsters’ roster, Orchards smuggle massive fluffy hooks into their fiddly math rock bangers, leaving you both humming melodies and admiring fret-tapping. A manic pop splurge from Brighton, the key to Orchards lies in Lucy Evers’s soaring vocals meeting guitarist Sam Rushton’s equally flying riffwork, a kind of action painting for the ears. That they compress all this into three minutes pop nuggets is a service to their country.
description_cy: Ceffyl trojan ar restr Big Scary Monster, mae Orchards yn smyglo bachau enfawr mewn i’w tiwns roc-math. Mi fyddech chi’n cerdded i ffwrdd yn hwmio’r alawon. Sblash o pop o Brighton, mae’r harddwch o Orchards yn gorffwys yn llais Lucy Ever’s sy’n hedfan dros riffs y gitarydd Sam Rushton. Pop can yn 3 munud o pop sy’n wasanaeth i’w wlad.

name: Owain Felstead
description: Already a finalist in a national songwriting competition while finishing his GCSEs, Cardiff’s Owain Felstead is both precocious and prodigious, a dab hand at well-crafted tracks for years now. Far from a glorified busker with a cheap amp, Felstead’s singer-songwriting spotlights mature dissection of relationships, modern pop production flourishes surrounding luxurious and confident vocals. Whether performing solo or writing killers for others, the future looks rosy here.
description_cy: Tra’n gorffen ei arholiadau TGAU, cyrhaeddodd Owain Felstead rownd derfynol mewn cystadleuaeth cyfansoddi cenedlaethol. Mae’r dyn ifanc o Gaerdydd yn dalentog tu hwnt ac yn gallu troi ei law at grefftio tracs yn hawdd ers rhai blynyddoedd bellach. Yn bell o fod yn fysgiwr gwael yn canu trwy amp rhad, mae’r canwr/cyfansoddwr yn rhoi perthnasau o dan y chwydd wydr wrth ganu ac yn creu cynhyrchiad pop fodern o gwmpas ei lais moethus a hyderus. Yn perfformio ar ben ei hun, neu’n ysgrifennu tracs anhygoel i bobl eraill, mae dyfodol Felstead yn edrych yn ddisglair.

name: Pagan Wanderer Lu
description: Bolton born / Cardiff bred Andrew Paul Regan has developed his own unique brand of intelligent pop-music (a more accessible tUnE-yArDs / a perkier Mark E Smith) over a number of years and almost as many name changes as Thee Oh Sees. His recently assembled band of Cardiff all-stars have ousted his trusty laptop and breathe life into his incredible music which leaves his razor sharp dry wit free to roam.
description_cy: Artist lleol sydd wedi bod ar y sin ers blynyddoedd, mae Pagan Wanderer Lu (anagram o enw’r cyfansoddwr; Andrew Paul Regan) yn cyfuno ffraeth, hiwmor, doethineb a chawl blasus o synau gwerin ag analog synths. Mae’r gerddoriaeth yn chwareus a hynod o fachog ag amrwd sydd wirioneddol yn dangos potensial agwedd rhagweithiol a dulliau DIY.

name: Papur Wal
description: Another in the top roster that Libertino Records have been assembling recently, Cardiff-via-North-Wales band Papur Wal have their slacker vibes absolutely nailed, issuing a stream of singles from the well-horizontal end of the rock spectrum. Latest track Dyddiau Well I Ddod is their best yet – slow, fuzzy guitar notes underpinning hazy vocals before crashing together in a brief burst of noise, early Pavement meeting Dinosaur Jr at chucking out time.
description_cy: Yn un arall ar frig rhestr Recordiau Libertino o fandiau, mae’r band o Gaerdydd-via-Gogledd-Cymru wedi maestroli eu vibes slacyr roc, wrth rhyddhau sawl sengl sy’n eistedd yn gyfforddus ar y sbectrwm roc. Mae eu trac diweddaraf ‘Mae’r Dyddiau Gwell i Ddod’ yn arddangos y band ar eu gorau – nodau gitar araf, aneglur a fuzzy, gyda llais ymlaciol a diog yn clasio a chwalu yn erbyn ei gilydd mewn cyfnod byr a sydyn, Pavement cynnar yn cyfarfod â Dinosaur Jr.

name: Patawawa
description: Sparkly DIY disco pop from Matlock in Derbyshire. Patawawa are as groovy as their name audibly sounds. Far out hooks straight from Nile Rodgers’ lost tapes combined with shimmering synths and blood-pumping beats – Patawawa will uplift the heaviest souls and add colour to the dullest days. Bring your dancing shoes or don’t – it won’t matter – your feet will be moving and your day will shine.
description_cy: Mae Patawawa yn creu disco pop befriog a mae nhw mor groovy a sut ma’u enw yn swnio i’r glust. Bachau ecsentrig yn syth o dapiau coll Nile Rodgers wedi’i gyfuno gyda synths ysblennydd a curiadau i bwmpio’ch gwaed o’ch pen, lawr i’ch traed a nol lan i’ch pen eto. Neuth Patawawa adio lliw i’r dyddiau mwyaf diflas. Dewch a’ch sgidiau dawnsio neu beidio – mi fydd eich traed yn symud.

name: Pengshui
description: Oh, this is going to take the roof off. A delirious, furious mix of grime, hip-hop and rock noise, the volume and energy at a PENGSHUi gig takes no prisoners. A meeting of minds all busy with other disparate projects (bassist Fatty from Submotion Orchestra and Newham Generals, Golide MC Illaman, drummer Pravvy Prav of Foreign Beggars and Jehst), PENGSHUi are a huge crash of mad guitars and spat-out vocals, and will have your brain, and whatever venue that play, like rubble.
description_cy: Bydd PENGSHUi yn codi’r to. Cymysgedd perffaith o grime, hip-hop a roc yw Penshui sy’n ffrwydiad enfawr o egni. Yn brysur tu hwnt gyda sawl prosiect arall (Fatty, y basydd o Submotion Orchestra a Newham Generals, a Golide MC Illaman, drymiwr Pravvy Prav o Foreign Beggars a Jehst) mae PENGSHUi yn wrthdrawiad o gitars gwallgof a lleisiau swnllyd sy’n sicr o ddinistrio dy ymennydd neu’r lleoliad.

name: Pigsx7
description: It’s been absolutely great to see the Pigs’ brutal ascent, selling out bigger and bigger venues while not compromising one inch of heaviosity. A vital cog in Newcastle’s sweaty and fertile music scene – vocalist Matt Baty has released Lower Slaughter, Terminal Cheesecake and more on his Box label, two Pigs play in Richard Dawson’s band – Pigsx7 have been building their fearsome live reputation for a few years now, earning worship through punishing doom riffs and metallic howling. Their debut album Feed The Rats twisted heavy rock into long, pummeling shapes; latest LP King Of Cowards condenses all the euphoric anguish into leaner, still devastating attacks. They’ll kill you, you’ll like it.
description_cy: Mae wedi bod yn wych gwylio Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs yn dringo’n gadarn i’r uchelfannau, yn gwerthu pob tocyn i sawl lleoliad enfawr, heb aberthu un fodfedd o drymder. Yn allwedd hanfodol i sîn gerddoriaeth chwyslyd a chynhyrchiol Newcastle – mae’r prif leisydd, Matt Baty wedi rhyddhau Lower Slaughter, Terminal Cheesecake a mwy ar ei label Box, mae na ddau fochyn arall yn chwarae ym mand Richard Dawson –  Mae Pigsx7 wedi bod ennyn eu parch yn fyw ers rhai blynyddoedd bellach ac erbyn hyn yn cael ei addoli gan y dorf trwy’r sgrechfeydd metelig a’i riffs tywyll. Mae eu LP diweddaraf King of Cowards yn cyddwyso’r holl ofid ewfforig mewn i ymosodiadau dinistriol. Byddwch yn barod i fwynhau cael ei lladd gan y Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs.

name: Plastic Estate
description: In the thick of a trend of 80s synth pop revival, with bands like Porches, Drab Majesty and HMLTD populating the front lines. New bands like Cardiffs very own Plastic Estate are popping up like daisies. But for sure, theirs is a name that without a doubt you’ll be hearing more and more from in the coming years. The five piece paste all their influences proudly decorating their sleeves in the two singles they’ve released so far, the latter of which being “Cremation” which sounds like a splicing of The La’s and Choirboy. The sexiest kind of amalgamation that we could certainly do with more of in my life.
description_cy: Mae Plastic Estate o Gaerdydd yn cymryd eu lle yn daclus mewn atgyfodiad 80au synth pop gyda bandiau fel Porches, Drab Majesty a HMLTD. Yn sicr, mae Plastic Estate yn enw y byddwch yn clywed fwyfwy dros y blynyddoedd nesaf. Clywn eu dylanwadau yn glir yn eu dwy sengl diweddaraf – gyda ‘Cremation’ yn swnio fel cyfuniad perffaith rhwng The La’s a Choirboy.

name: Porridge Radio
description: Initially the outlet for Dana Margolin’s brilliantly weirdo solo experiments, over the last few years Porridge Radio has become a collection of more or Brighton’s outcasts, and a gang fleshing out Margolin’s songs and ricocheting into other directions. Affiliated with Brighton’s other premier oddpoppers Garden Centre, Porridge Radio songs are a ramshackle rabble of guitar, keyboards and repeated vocals, absurdism treated with the same import as profundity. Or: pure wonky gold.
description_cy: Yn wreiddiol, allfa i arbrofion unigol od a gwych Dana Margolin oedd Prridge Radio, sydd wedi datblygu dros y blynyddoedd i gynnwys casgliad o artistiaid o Brighton yn ymuno fewn gyda’r hwyl.  Mae’r artistiaid ychwanegol wedi adlamu’r prosiect i gyfeiriadau cyffroes gwahanol. Trysor wonci pur.

name: Pozi
description: Freshly formed in 2018, this South London trio utilise drums, bass and violin to generate jarring and minimalistic post-punk that captures with a firm grip. Their live show is haunted with a unique intensity that is minimal yet powerful.
description_cy: Wedi’i ffurfio yn 2018, mae’r triawd yma o Dde Llundain yn defnyddio dryms, bass a ffidl i greu ol-pync minimalaidd sy’n eich denu a’ch gafael yn gadarn. Mae eu sioe byw yn eich aflonyddu gyda dwyster unigryw pwerus.

name: Raf Rundell
description: Through his solo work and his work with The 2 Bears and his countless projects and collaborations, Raf Rundell is one of Britain’s hardest-working musical characters. Blending his endless influences and talents, Raf Rundell creates uplifting electronic music with spliced up beats and funky hooks. He brings his new album O.M.GOD to life at Swn Festival this year.
description_cy: Ar ôl gwneud gwaith unigol, gweithio gyda The 2 Bears, cyd-weithio gyda sawl cerddor a gwneud sawl prosiect – Raf Rundell yw un o gerddorion mwyaf gweithgar Prydain. Wrth gyfuno ei ddawn a’i ddylanwadau, mae Raf Rundell yn creu cerddoriaeth electronig sy’n codi’r galon gyda curiadau cymhleth a hooks ffynci! Bydd cyfle i glywed ei albym newydd O.M.GOD yn Sŵn eleni.

name: Rainbow Maniac
description: Rainbow Maniac arrived into the Cardiff scene circa 2017 with tremendous vigour. They emerged stocked full of tunes, and an evident, urgent will to make noise. Taking the wry, subtly enigmatic words and thoughts of chief lyricist Conor Latcham as their pivoting foundation, tracks lurch from knowing cultural reference to jaggedly aloof home truths.
description_cy: Roc glochaidd pur o Gaerdydd-trwy-Pen Y Bont, Rainbow Maniac yw un o’r bandiau mwya’ aflafar o grombil newydd sin y brif-ddinas. Fel brwydr yn Wetherspoons chi’n gallu dawnsio iddo, mae’u caneuon yn gweld y band yn coginio cawl blasus o swagger Arctic Monkeys, blues rock The black Keys a grunge trwm Bush. Mae nhw’n gaddo album yn fuan - byddwch yn ofn a byddwch yn feddw.

name: Ritual Cloak
description: Ritual Cloak are Daniel Barnett (formerly of Samoans) and exquisite producer, Andrew Sanders. The two met when they were both recruited to form Jemma Roper’s backing band and after Daniel’s band Samoans split up, the duo joined forces to form Ritual Cloak. Latest track – ‘Everyone Is Hungover So I Walked The Mountain Alone’ is a misty concoction of glitchy minimal beats and climactic electronic ambience – it proves their united force is a masterful beast, in complete control of its direction.
description_cy: Daniel Barnett (Samoans) a’r cynhyrchydd Andrew Sanders yw Ritual Cloak. Fe gyd-weithodd y ddau am y tro cyntaf drwy chwarae fel band cefndirol i Jemma Roper ag ar ol i Samoans, band Daniel wahanu, fe ymunodd y ddau i greu Ritual Cloak. Mae’r track diweddaraf, ‘Everyone Is Hungover So I Walked The Mountain Alone’ yn gymysgedd niwlog o guriadau glitchy minimalaidd a synau electroneg amgylchyddol – mae’n profi bod grym unedig y ddau yn fwystfil meistrolgar, mewn rheolaeth llwyr o’u cyfeiriad.

name: Rosehip Teahouse
description: Formerly the tentative solo recordings of Cardiff resident Faye Rogers, Rosehip Teahouse has recently blossomed into glorious full band mode, fleshing out Rogers’ spellbinding folk pop songs and creating something touching and unique. Though sharing members with other local heroes Live, Do Nothing, Oh Peas and more, RT is very different, making lilting, happysad music such as recent single Same Sky: a rush of lovelorn imagery, chiming guitars and scattershot backing vocals. Cardiff’s best kept secret for how long?
description_cy: Yn dilyn recordio sawl cân yn unigol, mae Faye Rogers o Rosehip Teahouse erbyn hyn wedi ffeindio band i roi sain llawn, mawr a gogoneddus i ganeuon pop gwerin swynol Rogers. Yn defnyddio aelodau o fandiau eraill fel Live, Do Nothing, Oh Peas a mwy mae Rosehip Teahose yn creu cerddoriaeth chwerwfelys. Cân sy’n llawn gitars cariadus a lleisiau cefndirol scattershot yw ei sengl ddiweddaraf Same Sky. Mae Rosehip Teahouse un o gyfrinachau gorau Caerdydd, ond am ba hyd?

name: Rosie Lowe
description: An expert at dissecting the heartbreak and love of modern life, Rosie Lowe also crafts songs that gleam with a hybrid of pop, soul and delicate electronica. Recent second album ‘YU’ contains contributions from the likes of Floating Points and Jay Electronica, but is all about Lowe’s songs: gorgeous slow-burners that pulse with machine noise or choral backing, while Lowe’s vocals skip almost jazz-like between the gaps. Highly swoonworthy.
description_cy: Arbennigwr mewn dadelfennu cariad a’i natur i dorri calonnau yn bywyd modern, mae Rosie Lowe yn crefftio caneuon sy’n disgleirio gyda chymysg o pop, soul ac electronica cain. Mae’r ail albwm ‘YU’ yn cynnwys cyfranniadau gan Floating Points a Jay Electronica, ond caneuon Lowe yw canolbwynt y gwaith: caneuon prydferth sy’n llosgi’n araf ac yn pylsio gyda sain periannol neu lleisiau côr, tra bod llais Lowe yn sgipio trwy’r bylchau.

name: Rozi Plain
description: Some people travel around the world, collecting new experiences and sounds, then return home the same wonderful friend as before. There’s an immediately welcoming quality to Rozi Plain’s folk music, no matter the off kilter sounds and wandering delivery. An underrated and inventive guitarist, Plain’s vocal style also plays with space and texture, creating a disorientating and magical effect. New album What A Boost features Dan Leavers of The Comet Is Coming, folk dude Sam Amidon, Rachel Horwood of Bamboo and Trash Kit and more, and is a truly beautiful journey through enchanting sound. A real treasure.
description_cy: Mai rhai pobl yn teithio o gwmpas y byd, yn casglu profiadau a synau newydd, yna yn dychwelyd adref i’r un ffrindiau anhygoel fel y blaen. Mae yna ansawdd croesawus yn syth i gerddoriaeth werin Rozi Plain. Gitarist tanseiliedig a ddyfeisgar, mae steil canu Plain yn chwarae gyda gofod a gwead, yn creu effaith hudol i’ch drysu.

name: Ruthie
description: Once the vocalist in Leeds’ garage rock sluggers Bruising, Naomi Baguley’s new project is Ruthie, a near-180 degree swerve to epically sad, piano-led songs of love and fractured relationships. Wrapped in a hazy sound that occasionally erupts into beautifully tasteful full band wig-outs, the core of songs like ‘Land Of My Lover’ and ‘Spirit Now Moves’ are Baguley’s soft vocals and poetic imagery, retro-tinged singer-songwriting both classically tuned and quietly fierce.
description_cy: Falle bod chi’n nabod Naomi Baguley fel cantores o’r band garage rock o Leeds, Bruising, dyma ei phrosiect newydd, Ruthie. Yn troi 180 gradd o’i chefndir stwrllyd i greu caneuon lleddfus a trist gyda’i phiano. Wedi’i lapio mewn swn niwlog sy’n ffrwydro bob hyn a hyn mewn i wig-outs prydferth gyda band llawn. Gyda dawn clasurol a gallu ffyrnig, mae Ruthie yn rhywbeth arbennig.

name: Saint Agnes
description: A fixture in London’s more disreputable venues for some time now, Saint Agnes are a strutting blues rock peacock, wailing guitar pyrotechnics meeting Kitty Austen’s queen-of-the-world vocal fire. Songs like Sister Electric stomp like Godzilla, Dead Weather meeting AC/DC in a desert bar at high noon. You see? Saint Agnes do things to you.
description_cy: Lle mae gitars gwyllt a llais brenhinol Kitty Austen yn cwrdd, mae Saint Agnes yn fand blues roc o Lundain. Yn y gân Sister Electric mae’r sain yn yn stompio ar lawr fel Godzilla ac yn ffrwydo fel Dead Weather yn cwrdd ag AC/DC mewn bar gwag yng nghanol y prynhawn. Ti’n gweld? Mae Saint Agnes yn gwneud pethau dwl i dy ben di.

name: Sam Calver
description: Seasoned singer songwriter hailing from Hastings, Sam Calver is the infectious heart throb that we’re all looking for. Performing to huge audiences around the UK and wooing them all effortlessly and gaining a devoted following. Calver has the soulful magic about him that hold him comparable to the best of the best in the singer, songwriter world like Adele, Ed Sheehan and George Ezra.
description_cy: Mae Sam Calver, yn artist unigol yn wreiddiol o Hastings ac mae ei ganeuon yn rhai sydd aros gyda chi am amser hir. Mae wedi bod yn perfformio i gynulleidfaoedd anferthol o gwmpas y DU gan ennill cefnogaeth o bob cwr o’r wlad. Mae ei ganeuon yn falm i’r enaid ac mae ei lais hudolus yn wefreiddiol yn debyg i Adele, Ed Sheeran a George Ezra.

name: Scalping
description: More miscreants from the Bristol underground, Scalping play a techno-addled post punk that finds equal space for acid squelches and taut guitar throb. Dark and instrumental, their gigs fuse immersive, specially prepared visuals with an unyielding, propulsive flow of rhythm, while release-wise, their recent ChamberEP merges synth and 303 prongs with spiky guitar like some dream basement party.
description_cy: Yn cropian fyny o’r byd tanddaearol ym Mryste mae Scalping yn chwarae cerddoriaeth techno ôl-bync sy’n rhoi lle cyfartal i sgrechfeydd acid a gitars gwlyb. Yn dywyll ac yn offerynnol, mae gigs Scalping yn cyfuno visuals wedi’u paratoi o flaen llaw gyda rhythm angerddol a chyson. Yn ei EP diweddaraf Chamber, gwelwn synth a prongs 303 yn cael ei asio at ei gilydd i greu y parti tanddaearol gorau erioed.

name: Scavengers
description: At the forefront of the South Wales alt rock scene, drawing in huge local crowds with ease, Scavengers are going to be going places very soon. It would be a good idea to see them in their infancy now before they rocket off to the moon for big big things. Latest single “Deadlock” has also caught the attention of big name magazines like ALT Corner and Discovered magazine, make sure they catch your attention this Sŵn Festival.
description_cy: Ar ochr blaenaf y sin roc amgen De Cymru, yn tynnu cynulleidfaoedd enfawr yn hawdd, bydd Scavengers yn tyfu mewn enw cyn bo hir. Mae’n syniad da i’w weld nawr tra bod nhw’n enw ifanc, cyn iddynt rocedi i’r lleuad am bethau lot fwy. Mae’r sengl ddiweddaraf ‘Deadlock’ wedi ennill sylw cylchgronau mawr fel ALT Corner a Discovered Magazine, gwnewch siŵr bod nhw’n tynnu’ch sylw chi hefyd yng Ngŵyl Sŵn.

name: Seazoo
description: Both the cheeriest and the cheekiest band playing Sŵn this year, Wrexham’s Seazoo are seemingly designed for goofy smiles, via heartwarming, slightly wonky fuzz pop of the non-cheesy variety. Like Grandaddy judging a North Walian surfing contest, last year’s Trunks LP showed why festivals and 6Music sessions are fond of the ‘zoo: these songs are charming and joyous and made for mass listening.
description_cy: Y band mwyaf hwyliog ag eofn sy’n chwarae Sŵn eleni, daw Seazoo o Wrecsam gyda’u gwenau goofy, trwy fuzz pop (non-cheesy) i dwymo’r galon. Nid dyma ymddangosiad cyntaf y band i’r wyl a mae hi’n bleser pur cael croesawu nhw nol!

name: Self Esteem
description: A very different person since leaving indie-folk band Slow Club, Self Esteem finds Rebecca Lucy Taylor’s magnetic presence to the forefront, creating brilliant, unnerving modernist pop music. Solo stardom is clearly where Taylor fits, and in the gliding melodies and stark beats, in the excellent self-directed, staring disarmingly into camera music videos, Self Esteem means to grab it wholeheartedly. Recent debut album Complements Please is a rush of pop star moments both classic and experimental, and, in The Best, contains at least one song that in a just world would be a worldwide goddamn hit.
description_cy: Yn berson cwbwl gwahanol i’r person oedd yn y band werin amgen Slow Club, mae Self Esteem yn llwyfan i bresenoldeb magnetig Rebecca Lucy Taylor. Yn creu cerddoriaeth wych, fodern ac ysgytwol mae Taylor yn wefreiddiol wrth berfformio’n unigol. Ymysg y melodïau ysgafn a’r curiadau llwm mae’r artist unigol yn cofleidio pob cyfle i serennu. Wedi’i chyfarwyddo gan neb arall ond ei hun wrth syllu’n ddiarwybod mewn i’r camera mewn fideo cerddorol, mae Self Esteem yn hawlio pob perfformiad. Mae ei albym diweddaraf Compliments Please yn llawn caneuon gan seren bop – rheiny’n ganeuon pop-glasurol a chaneuon pop-arbrofol. Petai ni’n byw mewn byd cyfiawn byddai’r gân The Bestyn hit rhyngwladol – Ar fy llw mêt.

name: Shadowlark
description: Carefully crafting rich, cinematic electro-pop, the newly-formed three-piece from Leeds, Shadowlark have burst onto the scene this year and we look forward to welcoming them to Cardiff in October. The trio come armed with moreish melodies, swimming through blankets of wistful synths that evokes fuzzy nostalgia – an atmosphere that feels right at home on a Lana Del Rey or Lorde album.
description_cy: Yn creu pop electro, cyfoethog a sinematig mae’r triawd newydd o Leeds Shadowlark wedi ffrwydro mewn i’r sîn eleni a rydym yn edrych ymlaen at eu croesawi i Gaerdydd yr Hydref hwn. Mae’r triawd yn llwyddo i greu melodïau blasus trwy nofio dros donnau o synth gan greu ymdeimlad o hiraeth fuzzy. Cawn awyrgylch tebyg i awyrgylch albym Lorde neu Lana Del Rey wrth wrando ar Shadowlark.

name: She Drew The Gun
description: Hailing from The Wirral, She Drew The Gun have soaked up the Merseyside psychedelia floating in those waters, but have added both pop soul and queer protest elements to their music. Led by the irrepressible Louisa Roach, SDTG gigs are equally likely to include impassioned poetry as shimmering melodies, a mix that’s inspired fierce devotion, as well as attracted the Coral’s James Skelly, drafted in to produce recent album Revolution Of Mind.
description_cy: Yn wreiddiol o Wirral, mae She Drew The Gun wedi bod yn anadlu awyr seciadelic Merseyside wrth greu cerddoriaeth sy’n llawn cyfeiriadau at faterion cwiyr a pop soul. Wedi’u harwain gan Louis Roach, mae gigs SDTG yn debygol o gynnwys barddoniaeth angerddol fel prif alaw, sy’n gyfuniad gwych i ysbrydoli a thanio chwilfrydedd.

name: She Makes War
description: A one-person industry, Bristol’s Laura Kidd is as comfortable strumming a ukulele as blasting an electric guitar, on songs covering the political or highly personal, or any point inbetween. Something of a cult icon for her fanbase, the Patreon-funded ‘Brace For Impact’ is album number four for Kidd, and follows collaborations with the likes of Tanya Donelly, backing band work for Tricky and Viv Albertine, and a one-woman stand up show at the Edinburgh festival. The songs remain transcendent though: poignant or celebratory, lushly orchestrated or starkly beautiful, She Makes War is a full force for good.
description_cy: Diwydiant un person, mae Laura Kidd o Fryste’r un mor gyfforddus yn strymio ukele nag yw hi’n blastio gitâr electrig, gyda chaneuon sy’n trafod y gwleidyddol a’r personol ac unrhyw le rhyngddynt. Rhyw beth o eicon cwlt gyda’i chefnogwyr, ‘Brace For Impact’ yw bedwerydd albwm Kidd, ac yn dilyn cydweithrediadau gyda Tanya Donelly, Tricky a Viv Albertine, a sioe un-fenyw ‘stand up’ yng Ngŵyl Caeredin. Mae’r caneuon yn aros yn drosgynnol drwyddi draw: hudolus neu ddathliadol, wedi’i drefnu’n hyfryd neu’n blaen, yn hardd iawn, mae She Makes War yn rym cryf am dda.

name: Sick Joy
description: A Brighton-via-Newcastle trio ploughing a furrow through 90s grunge while injecting a little UK hard rock, Sick Joy are a strong brew of good times and glowering. Debut single ‘Smiling Shame’ should have tipped you off: four minutes of fierce trawling through Washington State swagger, while recent track ‘Dissolve Me’ crackles with the fever that someone like Mudhoney would be proud of. Twisted anthems cannot be far away.
description_cy: Wedi eu geni yn Newcastle ond erbyn hyn yn byw yn Brighton, mae Sick Joy yn fand sy’n ysgrifennu penillion grynj-static a chytganau ffrwydroadol. Sicrhewch eich bod chi’n aros o gwmpas i glywed llais drydanol y prif leisydd, Mykl sy’n sicr o ddangos egni di-droi’n-ôl, ofnus a gafaelgar Sick Joy.

name: Silverbacks
description: A ferocious live draw in Dublin’s increasingly packed array of hot new guitar bands, Silverbacks exist somewhere halfway between art rock and pub rock, a lairy, brainy and stylish menace. Their debut album, produced by Daniel Fox of Girl Band, should be one of 2019’s best, but on the already released material such as ‘Just In The Band’ their M.O. is clear – triple guitar interplay that recalls Television, Daniel O’Kelly’s not-quite-sung, not-quite-spoken utterings, and a general Parquet Courts-like loucheness that leaps from restrained to urgent and into collapse.
description_cy: Yn wreiddiol o Ddulyn, mae Silverbacks yn gyffrous, gan eu bod yn cynnig roc dan ddylanwad Efrog Newydd yn ei ffordd unigryw a thrafferthus ei hun. Ar ôl stopio ysgrifennu caneuon yn eu hystafelloedd gwely, daeth y pump aelod at ei gilydd, gan gynnwys y dau frawd Killian a Daniel O’Kelly, i greu cerddoriaeth sydd â phwyslais enfawr ar eiriau doniol a sych Daniel gan ychwanegu gitars trwm ac egnïol ar eu pennau.

name: Skating Polly
description: Oklahoman step-sibling trio, formed when Kelli was just 9 years old. Quickly picking up an impressive number of famous fans and collaborators (members of X and Veruca Salt, Calvin Johnson, Kliph Scurlock + many more) with a string of five excellent albums over the next intervening years. Musically they have naturally matured from raucous garage rock to timeless power-pop whilst lyrically they have always been way ahead of any of their peers.
description_cy: Mae’n anodd digrifio Skating Polly, ond eto mae ansawdd rhai o’u caneuon yn uwch ac yn well na unrhyw genre na chyfnod. Dechreuodd y ddeuawd aml-offeryn, Kelli Meyo a Peuton Bighorse, yn Oklahoma yn 2009. Recordiwyd eu halbym gyntaf ‘Taking Over the World’ yn 2019 gan ddenu llwyth o sylw gan eicons tanddaearol fel Exene Cervenka o X. Ar ôl dod at ei gilydd mewn sesiwn sgwennu, datblygodd y cynnyrch hwnnw i fod yn EP ‘New Trick’ (2017). Gyda brawd Kelli Meyo – Kurtis Meyo – fel trydydd aelod, mae’r band ar fin rhyddhau eu halbym gyntaf The Make It All Show.

name: Skinny Pelembe
description: The fractured, otherwordly music of Doncaster-via-Johannesburg’s Doya Beardmore, Skinny Pelembe tunes wash over you beautifully, mixing hazy beats and scattered guitar notes with Beardmore’s meandering, hopscotching vocal style. Recently signed to Gilles Peterson’s Brownswood Recordings, Skinny Pelembe’s forthcoming debut album is firmly in the ‘hotly anticipated’ category, helped by recent single No Blacks, No Irish, No Dogs, and its willingness to fuse anti-discrimination vibes with insistent, nagging groove. Do not miss.
description_cy: Mae cerddoriaeth arbennig, doredig Doya Beardmore, Skinny Pelembe o Doncaster-via-Johannesburg yn eich golchi yn ofalus gyda’r cyfuniad anhygoel o guriadau hyfryd, nodau gitâr wasgaredig a llais unigryw, chwareus Bearmore. Wedi’i arwyddo’n ddiweddar i gwmni recordio Gilles Peterson, Brownswood Recordings, mae albym cyntaf Skinny Pelembe yn y sefyll yn gadarn yn y categori ‘hir-ddisgwyliedig’ diolch i ‘No Blacks, No Irish, No Dogs’, a’i barodrwydd i asio teimladau gwrthwahaniaethol gyda grŵf sy’n mynnu ac yn nagio, mae’n rhaid i chi weld y gŵr yma.

name: Slagheap
description: After making themselves unmistakably well heard over the chatter of Bristols music scene, Slagheap are bringing their catchy choruses and wonky garage pop sound to Sŵn Festival 2019.  Their iconic debut single “Power Shower” is everything you want it to be, catchy, tastefully hilarious, punk as hell and most importantly a massive dance number; and believe us when they say that their sound translates even better live and they might just be your new favourite band after the end of Sŵn weekend.
description_cy: Ar ôl dod yn enw cyfarwydd yn y sîn gerddoriaeth ym Mryste, bydd Slagheap yn dod a’u caneuon catchy a’u sŵn garej pop i Wyl Sŵn 2019. Yn ei sengl eiconig cyntaf ‘Power Shower’ clywir gân sy’n chwaethus, catchy, doniol, pync ac yn bwysicach na dim byd, cân sydd am wneud i chi ddawnsio! Trystiwch ni, mae sŵn Slagheap hyd yn oed yn well yn fyw – efallai mai nhw bydd eich hoff fand ar ddiwedd benwythnos Sŵn…

name: Social Contract
description: A socially conscious gang of South Londoners, Social Contract tackle subjects like gentrification and political intolerance but come out swinging at the same time, guitars like battering rams. Latest single ‘Hoist Their Heads’ is their best yet: a squall of feedback and rumbling bass that resolves itself into a tight howl of urgency, vocalist Josh Eggerton’s careering wails adding another layer of intensity. They seem to wind it up a notch with each release, so get in early and hold on.
description_cy: Ffurfiwyd Social Contract arlein gan Josh a Scott Roach tra bu Josh yn chwilio am dŷ yn Llundain. Gan fod cariad at gerddoriaeth yn gyffredin rhwng y ddau, dechreuon nhw ysgrifennu caneuon oedd yn adlewyrchu’r math o awyrgylch yr oedden nhw’n byw ynddi. Gyda’r bwriad o berfformio’n fyw, daethon nhw o hyd i ddau gerddor Bisqu Wemyss (drymiau) a Chris Coward (bass). Yn rhan o label Beatnik Creative, mae’r pedwarawd o Dde Llundain yn paratoi at ryddhau eu EP newydd ‘Common Tongue’ yn hwyrach yn y Gwanwyn, gan sicrhau mae nhw yw un o’r bandiau amgen mwyaf cyffrous sydd o gwmpas ar hyn o bryd.

name: Sonny Winnebago
description: A new artist very much at the start of an exciting trajectory, Sonny Winnebago (formerly playing under his real name of Harvey Jones) has already locked in support from the Forte Project, an appearance at Focus Wales, and a choice support slot for Michael Kiwanuka. His music so far has been deliciously lilting melodies over accomplished acoustic guitar, though promised on forthcoming material are guest appearances from Sweet Baboo and Davey Newington of Boy Azooga. Get in at square one.
description_cy: Er bod Sonny Wineebago (Harvey Jones o’r blaen) ar ddechrau ei daith cyffrous, mae’r cerddor newydd yma wedi derbyn cefnogaeth gan Prosiect Forte eleni ac wedi ymddangos yn Focus Wales a chefnogi Michael Kiwanuka. Mae ei gerddoriaeth hyd yn hyn wedi bod yn felodïau hyfryd gyda gitar acwstig yn gyfeiliant perffaith iddo. Mae wedi addo bydd ei ddeunydd newydd yn cynnwys Sweet Baboo a Davey Newington o Boy Azooga. Da.

name: Squid
description: A many-headed unit from Brighton, Squid sound deceptively ramshackle, occasionally on the verge of collapse, before snapping back into another taut party section. Taking the rattling post-punk rhythm of LCD Soundsystem and splurging over it sax and weird analogue bloops, Squid’s deranged blowouts are best heard on singles ‘Houseplants’ and ‘The Dial’, singing drummer Ollie Judge’s nervous breakdown vocals navigating dreamy and chaotic terrain. And you can dance to it too.
description_cy: Rhyddhaodd y ffenomenom ôl-bync, disgo-ffync Squid eu sengl newydd o’r enw ‘Houseplant’ yn ddiweddar – mae’n dangos eu pŵer difrifol yn berffaith. Mae Squid yn adnabyddus am eu setiau byw, yn perfformio sets llawn egni, chaos ac anrhefn pur. Ar ôl perfformio mewn sawl gwŷl a chael cefnogaeth gan Radio 1, 6 Music a’u cynnwys yn The Guardian, The Quietus, NME a llawer mwy, mae 2019 yn argoeli’n dda iawn i Squid.

name: Sunshine Frisbee Laserbeam
description: If you’re looking for a fun and charming band to jump up and down to, belt a chorus to and sling beer at this Swn Festival, then you needn’t look any further than Sunshine Frisbee Laserbeam. As their ridiculous and frankly incredible name suggests, they’re just out to have fun, play some bangers and make sure everyone is having an 11/10 time, 100% of the time. The Birmingham born garage rockers will definitely charm you with guitar heavy party bops galore and playful song themes. There’s little more to say other than this lot are just out for fun. If you want to have fun, go see Sunshine Frisbee Laserbeam.
description_cy: Os ydych chi yng Ngwyl Sŵn eleni ac yn chwilio am fand hwyl a doniol sydd am wneud i chi neidio fyny ac i lawr a chyd-ganu pob un gair o bob cytgan gyda’r band, stopiwch, mae Sunshine Frisbee Laserbeam yma. Fel yr awgrymir eu henw bondigrybwyll, mae nhw yma i gael hwyl, chwarae tiwns a sicrhau bod pawb yn cael amser ARBENNIG – trwy’r amser.  Daw’r rocers garej doniol yma o Firmingham ac maent yn sicr o’ch swyno gyda’u bops gitar trwm a’u caneuon chwareus. Does dim angen dweud mwy, mae’r band yma yn barod i gael hwyl gyda chi yng Ngwyl Sŵn.

name: Super Marine
description: Still at the mischievously teasing stage of their career, Super Marine may only have a few snippets of songs online, but even looking through that tiny keyhole you can spy what might be the next South Wales rock band to blow up massively. A four-piece from Blackwood, Super Marine\’s determined, melodic rock and roll has already snagged support from the Forte Project, and nabbed production work from Pretty Viscious and 60 Ft Dolls helmsman Rich Jackson. Valleys Breakout 2019 starts here.
description_cy: Gyda dim ond pytiau byr o ganeuon ar gael, mae’r band yma o Dde Cymru yn barod wedi dal sylw Forte Project eleni ag yn gaddo codi i’r brig gyda’u cymysgedd penderfynol o roc a rol melodig ag agwedd uchelgeisiol. Ar hyn o bryd, mae’r band yn gweithio gyda Rich Jackson (60 Ft Dolls, Pretty Vicious) a ni methu aros i weld beth sydd ganddyn nhw i gynnig.

name: Swimming Tapes
description: If the band name conjures up images of hazy bliss, then the music of Swimming Tapes does so doubly. A weightless shimmer of summery guitars and gentle vocals, ST tunes have a dreamy, transportive quality, all your stress and worries beam away to a warm field or coastal drive. Debut album ‘Morningside’ and its associated, retro-filtered videos best show their aesthetic – mellow indie vibes that fans of Radio Dept, Real Estate or Teenage Fanclub should flock towards.
description_cy: Roedd gan Swimming Tapes agenda glir o’r diwrnod cyntaf. Ffurfiodd y band pan symudodd pedwar ffrind, Louis Price, Robbie Reid, Paddy Conn a Jason Hawthorne o Ogledd Iwerddon i Lundain a chwrdd â’r drymiwr, Andrew Evans. Wedi’i dylanwadu gan amryw o gerddorion, o felodïau ddiymdrech, hawddgar, hafaidd The Beach Boys i gymhlethdod gitars Real Estate, mae sŵn Swimming Tapes yn unigryw ac yn hollol ddigamsyniol.

name: Tacet
description: Online, the Cardiff trio, Tacet describe themselves as: Three-piece, dual vocal and single minded. This might sound simple, but the voyage Tacet take you on is far from that. The journey takes you from adventure rock (with added synth for atmosphere purposes) to roaming melodies and nimble guitar lines. Tubelord’s math-rock sharpness and yelping vocals, Deftones’ chilling whispers and a sprinkle of Myspace-era emo is all to be heard on their recent single In Colour.
description_cy: Mae Tacet yn disgrifio’u hun fel: Three-piece, dual vocal and single minded. Efallai bod hyn yn swnio’n syml, ond mae’r daith mae Tacet yn dilyn yn bell o hyn. Mae nhw’n cymryd ni o rock anturus (gyda synths ar gyfer yr awyrgylch) at alawon sy’n crwydro rhwng llinellau gitars chwim.

name: Telgate
description: Keepers alive of a certain psychedelic glam flame in Cardiff, Telgate have become renowned in the capital for their stomping, theatrical live detonations. It’s giant rock shapes with a vital queer heart, taking in much guitar wigging, spacey blues rock and, in vocalist Casper, a frontperson whose full-body wailing conjures some amalgam of Lydia Lunch, Robert Plant and the Runaways, in six inch heels. Get a good dose.
description_cy: Mae Telgate wedi cadw’r fflam seicadelig a glam yn fyw yng Nghaerdydd ers rhai blynyddoedd bellach, maent yn adnabyddus am eu gigs stompus a theatraidd. Yn creu sioeau roc enfawr gyda’u calonnau ciwyr holl-bwysig, gitars gwych a’u roc blŵs. Mae eu prif leisydd Casper yn llwyddo i greu perfformiadau tebyg i berfformiadau Lydia Lunch, Robert Plant a The Runaways – ond mewn sodlau 6 modfedd. Well i chi fynd i weld nhw ife?

name: Threatmantics
description: A constant oddball presence in Cardiff for over 10 years now, like a viola-aided Terminator, Threatmantics just will not stop. Having evolved gradually through those years, the line up now seems settled on Heddwyn, Huw, Andrew and Graf, and a ramshackle approach to oblique rock and roll thrills, one that hops between backwoods folk tales, careering viola drone and crashing guitar thrash. Picking up a copy of their new album Shadow On Your Heart, lovingly screen-printed by hand, at this gig will confirm all of this: Threatmantics are uncategorisable weirdos, and should be cherished.
description_cy: Gyda presenoldeb cyson a chryf yma yng Nghaerdydd am dros 10 mlynedd, fel Terminator gyda help y fiola, ni fydd Threatmantics yn stopio. Byth. Ers esblygu’n raddol dros y blynyddoedd, mae’r lein-yp wedi setlo nawr ar Heddwyn, Huw, Andrew a Graf, a mae nhw’n llwybro’u ffordd gyda roc a rôl ramshackle sy’n neidio rhwng chwedlau gwerin, drôn fiola a thrash gitâr.

name: Thyla
description: Hailing from Brighton, where every single human being, and some of their pets, is in a band, Thyla stand out through their dream pop being a little more intense, a little more belting than most. A wall of crashing guitars cloak Millie Duthie’s powerful vocals, backed by a rhythm section able to smash things to space when necessary. A beast of music able to switch from shimmering beauty to towering sound at each moment.
description_cy: Yn dod o Brighton, lle mae pob un bod dynol, a rhai o’u hanifeiliaid anwes, mewn band, mae Thyla yn sefyll allan gyda’u pop breuddwydiol sydd bach fwy dwys na’r gweddill. Wal o gitârs sy’n crashio ar draws llais pwerus Millie Duthie, ac adran rythm sy’n chwalu popeth i’r gofod pan bod angen.

name: Tiny Deaths
description: A Minneapolis duo of Claire De Lune on honeyed vocals and limelight-shy producer Grant Butler, Tiny Deaths electro-pop is decadent, plush and expansive. Conjuring up similar dreamy sounds to Beach House or Poliça, the two TD albums so far also take detours into more playful territory, with songs like Always almost like soundtracks to alternate universe ‘80s film soundtracks. Either way, spells will be conjured.
description_cy: Claire De Lune sy’n canu a’r cynhyrchydd swil Grant Butler, yw’r ddeuawd o Minneapolis. Mae electro-pop Tiny Deaths yn benderfynol, yn foethus ac yn amrywiol. Yn debyg i sŵn Beach House neu Polica, mae’r ddwy albym gan Tiny Deaths yn ein harwain at dirwedd fwy chwareus gyda chaneuon fel Always yn debyg i soundtrack ffilm amgen o’r 8au.

name: Tom Ravenscroft (DJ Set)
description: Long established as part of BBC 6 Music’s team of presenters, in the section marked ‘find new and weird tunes for people to hear’, Tom Ravenscroft’s DJ sets are like his regular radio broadcasts: a space to celebrate the stuff that just doesn’t fit anywhere else; the noisy, dissonant, unique music that you know is out there and always keeps you looking. Whether that’s outsider hip-hop, detuned electronica or mad footwork from Uganda (we humbly request something on Nyege Nyege Tapes), you’ll be glad you were introduced.
description_cy: Mae Tom yn cyflwyno’i gerddoriaeth wych i wrandawyr o gwmpas y byd trwy sawl prosiect, gan gynnwys ei raglen rheolaidd am 9 o’r gloch ar nos Wener, a’i raglen Recommends ar BBC Radio 6 Music. Yn arddangos cerddoriaeth wedi’u dewis yn ofalus o bob cwr o’r byd ac yn eu rhoi gyda’i gilydd mewn mix arbennig i greu cawl o synau gwahanol ac eclectig.

name: Trudy & the Romance
description: Formed in Liverpool in 2016, Trudy & The Romance have come a long way since becoming renowned for their take on gentlemanly, ‘50s crooner rock and roll. Now expanded to a full on 6-piece, 2019’s debut album Sandman throws near-everything into their mix: pedal steel, harp, Deserters Songs-era Mercury Rev-style strings, multipart harmonies and doo-wop classiness. They’re still a rock and roll band though, just one existing in an epic, out-of-time wormhole.
description_cy: Wedi’i ffurfio yn Lerpwl yn 2016, mae Trudy & The Romance wedi dod yn bell ers ennill enwogrwydd am eu fersiwn o roc a rôl crwner y 50au. Nawr yn fand 6-aelod, mae’r albwm cyntaf Sandman yn taflu bron popeth yn y gymysgedd: pedal dur, y delyn, llinynnau steil Mercury Rev, harmonïau amlran a chlasurdeb dw-wop.

name: Twin Peaks
description: Their website has the address twinpeaksdudes.com, which might give you an indication of the easy-going, good-times vibes on offer here. Formed in Chicago by a bunch of youngsters, Twin Peaks quickly turned heads by blazing through house parties and home recordings split between sloppy garage rock and deceptively touching power pop. As seen in their charmingly lo-fi music videos, Twin Peaks are a band as comfortable chugging beer as writing love letters, half Replacements, half Stones, and all killer.
description_cy: Gwefan Twin Peaks yw twinpeaksdudes.com, sy’n rhoi syniad i chi o’r vibes ymlaciol, hapus a phositif sydd ar gael gan y band yma. Wedi’i ffurfio yn Chicago gan griw o bobl ifanc, dechreuodd Twin Peaks greu cyffro a chynnwrf wrth berfformio mewn house-parties gyda’u sŵn sy’n gyfuniad perffaith o roc garej a pop twyllodrus a phwerus. Fel y gwelir yn eu fideos cerddoriaeth lo-fi swynol, mae Twin Peaks yn fand sy’n gyfforddus wrth lowncio cwrw ac ysgrifennu llythyron cariad, weithiau’n Replacements, weithiau’n Stones, weithiau’n Killers ond eto’n 100% Twin Peaks.

name: Vistas
description: The fresh young sound of Edinburgh, in perma-touring indie pop form. Vistas are three young men who write devilishly catchy up-tempo powerhouses, notable both for their unflagging rhythms and Prentice Robertson’s birdlike, fluttering falsetto notes. Latest single Eighteen is another boisterous belter, showing why they’re moving from hot tour support to hot tour sellouts.
description_cy: Cyflwynir i chi sŵn ifanc a newydd o Gaeredin – Vistas yw’r tri dyn ifanc sy’n ysgrifennu caneuon pwerus, bywiog a catchy gyda llais ffalseto arbennig Plike Robertson. Mae ei sengl ddiweddaraf Eighteen yn gân syfrdanol arall, yn profi pam eu bod yn symud o fand sy’n cefnogi i fand sy’n teithio o gwmpas y byd.

name: We Were Promised Jetpacks
description: Longstanding members of the Glasgow music scene, having moved there from Edinburgh just after forming, We Were Promised Jetpacks are currently celebrating 10 years of their classic album These Four Walls, via a humongous North America and Europe tour. Beloved thanks to its crunchy guitar work, fierce college rock hooks and strident, strong-accented vocals, it’s an album that only acts as a starting point for a range of material through the years, on FatCat and Big Scary Monsters, tackling knotty emotions in sing-it-out-loud style.
description_cy: Aelodau hirsefydlog o’r sîn gerddorol yn Glasgow, ar ôl symud yno o Edinburgh ddim yn hir ar ôl ffurfio, mae We Were Promised Jetpacks yn dathlu 10 mlynedd o’u albwm clasurol These Four Walls ar hyn o bryd, wrth fynd ar daith ar draws Gogledd America ac Ewrop. Yn annwyl a gwerthfawr i’w grandawyr ffyddlon, diolch i’r gitarau crensiog, bachau roc coleg ffyrnig, acenion cryf, mae’n albwm sydd yn actio fel pwynt dechreuol i’r amryw o ddeunydd anhygoel ar draws y blynyddoedd.

name: Working Men’s Club
description: Old heads on young shoulders with Working Men’s Club, as their cocksure swagger meets the ghosts of the febrile post-punk era. A just-out-of-their-teens gang from Todmorton, debut single ‘Bad Blood’ shows fierce promise, as clipped drum machine underpins tight, repetitive guitar lines, with Sydney Minsky-Sargeant’s semi-spoken drawl recalling Mark E Smith or Lou Reed at their most sardonic. An intense, bruising workout.
description_cy: Daw Syd a Jake o Todmorden a Hebden Bridge, a theuluoedd y ddau yn dod o Wlad Pwyl, tra bod Giulia yn dod o Lake Garda, yr Eidal. Heb os felly mae aml-gendlaetholdeb yn hynod o bwysig i’r band ar ôl cwrdd yng ngholeg ym Manceinion. Gyda’r grŵf The Knack-aidd a llafar-ganu Syd sy’n torri trwy’r llinellau gitar Strokes-aidd a dylanwadau Mark E Smith yn llusgo trwy’r caneuon, cawn deimlad byw o dreulio ddydd Sadwrn yn prowlian mewn siopau thrift a hongian o gwmpas y lle gyda ffrindiau.

name: Wych Elm
description: Their single comes sealed inside a replica body bag. Song titles include School Shooter and Help Me. Happy scamps Wych Elm are another disgustingly young band in Bristol’s fetid scene, and newest EP Rat Blanket is a squall of noise and slacker moves, with Caitlin Elliman’s vocals jumping from slow and hazy to harsh and psychotic like a twitchy serial killer. They are Kim Deal in the Breeders AND the Pixies i.e. look out.
description_cy: Mae eu sengl yn cyrraedd o fewn replica ‘body bag’. Teitlau caneuon yn cynnwys School Shooter a Help Me. Mae’r scamps hapus Wych Elm yn fand ifanc eto o sîn Bryste, gyda’r EP diweddaraf, Rat Blanket yn hwrdd o sain a symudiadau slacker, gyda llais Caitlin Elliman yn neidio o araf a niwlog i llym a seicotig fel llofrudd cyfresol. Wych Elm yw Kim Deal yn y Pixies a’r Breeders. Peryglus. Edrychwch allan.

name: Ynys
description: Radio Luxembourg / Race Horses founding member Dylan Hughes finally re-appeared earlier this year with his first recording in far too long, released on the excellent Libertino label. “Caneuon” showcases his keen ear for richly harmonious but sweetly off kilter psychedelic pop melodies that fans of his previous bands earlier works will instantly recognise, savour and welcome back into both their ears and hearts.
description_cy: Prosiect newydd Dylan Hughes (gynt o Race Horses) yw Ynys. Mae gwrando ar Ynys yn teimlo fel mynd ar bererindod braf, mewn car vintage llawn mixtapes seicadelig, meddal a hiraethus. Mae’r casgliad newydd yma o ganeuon yn seiliedig ar gannoedd o syniadau nath Dylan recordio gyda’i lais dros y pedwar mlynedd diwethaf. Mae dawn Dylan Hughes i ddyfeisio alawon perffaith yn dod i’r amlwg wrth wrando ar unrhywbeth mae wedi recordio, a mae’r aros hir am gerddoriaeth newydd gan yr artist yma wedi bod werth bob eiliad.

name: Zooni
description: Barely a few songs old in online terms, Brighton’s Zooni have already caught the ear of the Square Leg label (run by Alt-J producer Charlie Andrew), and debut single ‘Pany’ begins to illustrate why. A tremulous wash of piano and drum skitter, topped with gentle, high-pitched crooning, it’s a swoon of delicate beauty. Further tracks such as ‘Haze’ add in gorgeous folk touches, and show Zooni’s range: a treat of varied, cinematic lushness.
description_cy: Cyflwynir Zooni i chi – band gelf pop o Brighton sydd â chymysgedd pwerus ond tyner o eiriau barddonol a gwaedau arallfydol. Golchir curiadau hypnotig gan nodau piano tyner a gitar onglog gan Peter Martin, George Godwin, Ben Clark a Matt Glasbey. Mae’r band wedi creu enw da i’w hunain am eu sioe byw atmosfferig, gan greu fformat newydd a diddorol i roc amgen. Maent yn llwyddo i blethu Nick Drake, Grizzly Bear a Portishead.
